texts.es:
Josefa es una microempresaria clienta de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia: 

Josefa tiene 41 años, es casada y tiene un hijo. Ella tiene un negocio de venta de tacos frente a una transitada terminal de camiones desde hace 11 años. 

Su puesto es de lámina fija y ahí vende tacos de suadero, longaniza, al pastor, alambres  y tripa. Le apoya su esposo atendiéndolo y tienen un empleado, sus clientes son ya de mucho tiempo y en su mayoría son los choferes de la terminal.

Este préstamo lo pide para costear un horno para carne que mandó a hacer con un herrero. Gracias al esfuerzo en su negocio Josefa se encuentra arreglando su casa poco a poco, y su reto es terminar este proyecto.
texts.en:
Josefa is a microentrepreneur who is a client of Kubo Financiero and this is her story:

Josefa is 41 years old, married and has one son. She has a business selling tacos outside a busy bus terminal for the last 11 years.

Her stall is fixed and she sells suadero tacos, sausages, alambres ( chicken & bacon tacos) & tripas (small intestines). Her husband supports her in the stall and they also have an employee. Their clients are long term customers and the majority of them are drivers from the terminal.

This loan is to pay for an oven to prepare the meat, which she has already ordered from a blacksmith. Thanks to her efforts with her business, Josefa is managing to fix up her house little by little and her challenge is to finish this project.

loans.use: pay for an oven to prepare meat for her business

loans.name: Mokhira

texts.ru: Мохире 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Мохиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Мохира занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Мохиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 15 овец, на своем огороде также выращивает картошку и кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мохира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Мохира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Mokhira is 44 years old, married, and with her husband is raising three children. Mokhira has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Mokhira raises livestock, having begun 20 years ago with a livestock purchase of 1,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Mokhira currently has on her homestead: four dairy cows and 15 sheep; and in her garden she also grows potatoes and corn. Monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS). With the aim of further developing her homestead, Mokhira turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase sheep for expanding her livestock count.

Mokhira plans to invest income from the loan in further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Shakhlo

texts.ru: Шахло 27 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Шахло - высшее образование, она работает преподавателем кыргызского языка в местной школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Шахло занимается животноводством, стартовав 5 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Шахло, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 26 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шахло обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Шахло планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Shakhlo is 27 years old, married, and with her spouse is bringing up two children. Shakhlo has a higher education. She works as a teacher of Kyrgyz language at a local school. As an additional source of income for her family, Shakhlo raises livestock, having begun 5 years ago with a livestock purchase of 20,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Shakhlo currently has on her farm: four dairy cows, 26 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Shakhlo applied to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to buy sheep for expanding her livestock count.

Shakhlo plans to invest income from the loan to further propagation of the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Makhpuratkhan

texts.ru: Махпуратхан 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 6 детей. У Махпуратхан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Махпуратхан занимается животноводством, стартовав 11 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Махпуратхан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Махпуратхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Махпуратхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Makhpuratkhan is 42 years old, married, and with her spouse is raising six children. Makhpuratkhan has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Makhpuratkhan tends livestock, having begun 11 years ago with a livestock purchase of 12,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Makhpuratkhan currently has on her farm: two dairy cows and 20 sheep. Monthly income amounts to 11,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Makhpuratkhan turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan - to purchase cows for expanding her livestock count.

Makhpuratkhan plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Apiet

texts.ru: Апиет 61 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Апиет - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Апиет занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Апиет, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 35 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Апиет обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку лошадей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Апиет планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Apiet is 61 years old, married, and, together with her husband, is raising 3 children.  Apiet has a secondary education.  The major source of income for Apiet's family is Apiet's work in animal husbandry, which began 10 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS.  Thanks to Apiet's hard work, she now has in her herd 1 milk cow and 35 sheep.  Her monthly income is 11,000 KGS.  With the goal of expanding her herd, Apiet turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase horses for breeding.  With the income she earns from the loan, Apiet plans to save for the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy horses

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно начинающая бизнес леди. Она живет в городе Кургантюбе. Ей 47 лет. Раъно вдова и сама воспитывает двоих детей. Она сейчас активно готовится к открытию торгового бизнеса и уже арендовала место для продажи. Раъно планирует заняться продажей женской одежды. Ей будет помогать брат, который занят в этой сфере. К сожалению собственного сбережения Раъно не хватает  и поэтому она обратилась за кредитом. На сумму кредита она собирается закупить товар и начать торговлю.
texts.en: Ra'no is brand new business woman.  She lives in the city of Qurgan-Tube, and is 47 years old.  Ra'no is widowed and is raising two children by herself.  She is actively preparing to open a retail business and already rented a space in which she plans to sell women's clothing.  Her brother, who also works in this field, will help her.  Unfortunately, Ra'no does not have savings of her own, and for this reason she is asking for a loan.  With the money from the loan, she is planning to purchase goods and start selling.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing to resell

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Soy la señora maria eugenia, tengo 53 años, soy casada y tengo 3 hijos, ellos ya estan casados y vivo en casa propia. Mi negocio es de venta de dulces y juguetes, me dedico a esto desde hace 10 años. Soy una persona cumplida y responsable. Estoy solicitando el préstamo para comprar dulces y juguetes para las ventas de fin de año.
Mis principales logros es que con mi negocio y con la ayuda de mi esposo he podido sacar adelante a mi familia y me he podido comprar algunas cosas.
texts.en:
I'm Mrs Maria Eugenia, I'm 53 years old, married and have 3 children who are already married and I live in my own house. My business is selling sweets and games, which I've been doing for 10 years. I'm an accomplished and responsible person. I'm asking for this loan to buy sweets and games for end of year sales.

My main achievement is my business and with my husband's help, I've been able to help my family get ahead and also to buy a few things.

loans.use: to buy sweets and games to sell

loans.name: Mariely

texts.es:
Mariely es soltera y tiene 34 años, nació en la provincia Andres Ibáñez de Santa Cruz de la Sierra – Bolivia, no tiene hijos y vive con sus padres. Culmino sus estudios y se titulo en la carrera de Contaduría Pública de la Universidad Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno, actualmente quiere cursar una especialidad en Recursos Humanos, para lo cual solicitó un crédito educativo para poder financiar sus Estudios.

Mariely actualmente ejerce su profesión y es voluntaria para la realización de diferentes obras sociales. Ella manifiesta que quiere especializarse en el área de Recursos Humanos el cual complementará sus actuales conocimientos y de esta manera mejorará la administración de la empresa donde se desempeña.

Mariely ayuda económicamente en los gastos de su hogar, por lo cual sus ingresos no alcanzan para poder pagar la especialidad que desea realizar, lo que se constituye en un obstáculo para lograr la meta que se ha trazado. 

Mariely esta convencida de que las personas que sobresalen en la vida son aquellas que están dispuestas a luchar por sus sueños hasta alcanzarlos, ella se considera una de estas personas. 

Mariely de antemano agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a otros y generan nuevas oportunidades de crecimiento, así como a ella se le están otorgando ahora.
texts.en:
Mariely is single and she is 34 years old.  She was born in Andres Ibáñez de Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia. She does not have children and she lives with her parents.  She finished her studies and received a degree in Public Relations from the University Autónoma Gabriel Rene Moreno.  Currently she wants to take courses in Human Resources Management.  She is seeking a loan so that she can finance her studies.

Mariely currently works in a professional job and volunteers in a variety of social works programs.  She wants to specialize in Human Resources, which will complement her current expertise and will help her improve the administration in the company for which she currently works.

Mariely helps pay the household expenses and this is why her income is insufficient to pay for school.  This is an obstacle in achieving her goals.

Mariely believes that the people who survive in life are those that fight for their dreams and make them come true.  She considers herself one of these people.

Mariely would like to thank the people that are helping others financially because they are helping to generate new growth opportunities, which is now being granted to her.

loans.use: to pay for her graduate studies in Human Resources Management.

loans.name: Dildora

texts.ru: Трудное условие жизни заставляет человека направлять все свои усилия и мотивировать существующие ресурсы. Дилдора является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем, но не имеет  детей. Ее муж занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур. Его доход не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Дилдора решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Difficult life conditions cause a person to direct all their strengths and to motivate existing resources. Dildora is one of those personalities that tries to improve living conditions and to stimulate the economic well-being of the family. She is married, but does not have money. Her husband raises crops His income is not enough to support the family with all the necessities. Dildora decided to help her husband to provide for the family.

With this aim, she studied in the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. Now, she is fully able to start her own business and to become successful in this area. She wants to organize a business sewing women's clothing, since she has experience in this type of work.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine, in order to start a new business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Farogat

texts.ru: Женщина, которая является хранительницей очага своего дома и опорой для своих детей, имеет грандиозную идею, организовать новый бизнес. Она много лет не имела источника дохода. Так как ее муж имеет маленькую зарплату и не в состоянии обеспечить своих детей со всеми не обходимыми средствами. Дети год за годом требуют больше благ, так как они развеваются вместе с развевающимся миром. Она решила организовать бизнес выращиванием пшеницы. Она долго искала помощь и наконец, она узнала о курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много позитива для себя. После завершения курса она получила сертификат. Теперь она готова начать бизнес, однако она не имеет денег, чтобы купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: This woman, who is the guardian of the hearth in her home and a supporter for her children, has a grandiose idea to start a new business. For many years, she has not had a source of income. Since her husband has a small salary and is not in a business to support their children with all the necessities. The children year after year demand more care, since they are developing in a developing world. She decided to start a business growing wheat. She has long searched for help and finally took the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women. She took part in this course and gained a lot for herself. After finishing the course, she received a certificate. Now, she is ready to start a business, and at the same time does not have money to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. She is requesting a loan of 1,000 somoni to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for organizing a new business

loans.name: Mehry

texts.ru: Мехри родилась в 1968 году. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она замужем за преподавателя. Она занималась выращиванием сельхоз культур, но так как ее доход был маленьким, она решила организовать новый бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Мехри с такой целью участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Mehry was born in 1968. She is married and is raising three children. She is married to a teacher. She raises crops, but since her pay is small she decided to start a new business sewing women's clothing. Mehry with this aim participated in the course "Bring on Success" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Erkin

texts.ru: Эркин 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Эркин - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Эркин занимается животноводством, стартовав 17 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эркин, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 лошадь, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эркин обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эркин планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Erkin is 38 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising 3 children.  Erkin has a secondary education.  Erkin's work in animal husbandry, beginning 17 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 20,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Erkin's hard work, she now has 1 horse and 10 sheep in her herd.  Her monthly income is 5,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing the size of her herd, Erkin turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the money from the loan, Erkin plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: Одилчон начинающий фермер, живет в районе Спитамен. Ему 34 года. Он женат, имеет детей. Одилчон в данный момент собирается начать земледельческую деятельность. Он арендовал 3 га орошаемого участка земли на бессрочный срок. Одилчон уже обработал землю, закупил семена пшеницы. Он планирует каждый год выращивать пшеницу и иметь доход от продажи зерна. Сейчас он обратился за кредитом, чтобы закупить минеральные удобрения. Весной он хочет собрать хороший и качественный урожай. Одилчон знает, что справится. Он хорошо осведомлен о земледельческой деятельности. Сейчас ему нужна только финансовая поддержка.
texts.en:
Odiljon is a beginning farmer and lives in the Spitamen region. He is 34 years old. He is married and has children. Odiljon currently intends to start agricultural activities. He has rented three hectares of irrigated land for an indefinite period. Odiljon already prepared the land and bought wheat seeds. He plans every year to grow wheat and to have income from selling grains.

Now, he applied for a loan to buy mineral fertilizers. In the spring, he wants to collect a good and high-quality crop. Odiljon knows how to cope. He is knowledgeable about agricultural activities. Now, he is in need only of financial support.

loans.use: to acquire mineral fertilizers for a wheat crop

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Doña Ángela  es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora, es soltera y  vive con sus hijos en la comunidad al sur de Honduras. 
Doña Ángela su negocio es una pulpería, el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de  azúcar, café, pan, frijoles, manteca,  carne,  etc. Con el préstamo espera un aumento de las ventas debido a que contara con más producto  que ofrecer a los clientes que lo visitan por que para esta temporada navideña se vende mucho este tipo de producto y espera  así poder cubrir sus necesidades.
Doña Ángela así mismo desea que su estilo de vida y el de familia mejore  y se vea reflejado con esta inversión. En unos años el sueña con que su negocio este posicionado como el más grande y  conocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a su familia  a que se conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades.



Choluteca, Honduras –Diciembre  del 2013
texts.en:
Ángela is an honest, responsible, and hard-working person.  She is single and lives with her children in a community in southern Honduras.

Ángela’s business is a grocery store.  She needs the loan to buy sugar, coffee, bread, beans, shortening, and meat, etc.  With the loan she hopes to increase her sales because she will have more products to offer her customers who visit her.  During this Christmas season this type of product sells a lot.  She hopes to be able to cover her necessities.

Ángela wishes that her lifestyle and that of her family improves and can be seen through this investment.  In a few years she dreams that her business will be positioned as the biggest and most well-known in the area.  She wishes to be able to continue supporting her family and that they become good people with better opportunities.

Choluteca, Honduras – December, 2013

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, bread, beans, shortening, and meat, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Las Trabajadoras (Hardworking Women) Group

texts.en:
This group of four hard working women, from the village of San Andrés Villa Seca, Retalhuleu, Guatemala, are starting their second nine-month cycle with the Namaste Foundation.  As with their first cycle, they will receive a business advisor who will help them write a business plan and then work with them monthly to implement that plan.  They will also receive a loan and some financial education.  These women are all illiterate and have businesses selling different types of food.

Manuela (2nd from right) is 30 years old and married with five children, ages 2, 6, 9, 12 and 15.  The four oldest children are in school.  Her husband works in agriculture and helps her with household and family expenses.  They live in a house made of corrugated metal and her dream is to increase her sales and profits enough to build a proper house for her family.

For 13 years she has been selling fish, vegetables and tomatoes in her village.  She has a lot of experience selling these products and is well known and respected in her community.  These factors have allowed her to sell a lot of product.  At the end of her first nine-month cycle with Namaste she had profits of 3,729 Guatemalan Quetzales (approximately US $497).  She was very successful at growing her business during that cycle and in the last few months she increased her profits by an average of 30% per month.  She would like to maintain that growth rate and projects profits of 7,586 Quetzales (about US $960) by the end of this cycle.  With her loan she will be buying more product to sell, and in the coming months she will be exploring new markets and continuing to improve the administration of her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, es casada, vive junto a su hija y dos nietos, ella es la jefa del hogar, para proveer a su familia de lo necesario se dedica a vender tortillas  y pupusas, lo hace de 6:0 a.m. a 8:00 p.m., de lunes a domingo, para ella es una actividad que no representa ningún problema ejercerla.
Reina invertirá en la compra de mesas para y bancas, para su negocio, le ayudara a dar una mejor imagen a su negocio, mejorara la atención. Espera atraer más clientes, mejorar la rentabilidad y fortalecer las ganancias, con las cuales podrá cancelar sus deudas así como también seguir cubriendo los gastos familiares.
Aspira a tener un chalet para crecer en su negocio y brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Reina is married and lives with her daughter and two grandchildren. She is the head of household. In order to provide for her family, she works selling tortillas and pupusas. She does this from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm, Monday through Sunday. For her this is a business that she can carry on without any problems.

Reina will invest in purchasing tables and benches for her business. This will help her give her business a better image and improve service. She expects to attract more customers, improve profitability, and strengthen her earnings so that she can pay off her debts as well as continue to cover her family's expenses.

Her goal is to have a small store in order to expand her business and make her customers more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy tables and benches.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a 36-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are still in school. 

Marivic is a very hard working entrepreneur. She has a handicraft business in the Philippines and she requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more materials like shells, nylon threads, wires, cutters, etc. for her business.

Marivic has been in this business for 10 years and in the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more materials like shells, nylon threads, wires, cutters, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El Señor Carlos es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene casa propia, con hijos y comenta que es dueño de una despensa bien surtida que tiene en su casa. Es una persona muy trabajadora, que día a día se esfuerza por poder dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
Es un señor muy trabajador, responsable y muy honesto, empezó a trabajar como vendedor ambulante recorría todo los días y soñaba de tener una despensa bien surtida. Hoy ya cuenta con su propio negocio cuenta con clientela formada con buenos ingresos mensuales.
Carlos pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos generales para su despensa, ya que quiere poder surtirlo con todo tipo de productos, y que así sus clientes siempre estén satisfechos.
texts.en:
Carlos is from the city of Santaní.  He has his own house and children.  He says that he has a well-stocked store in his house.  He is a very hard-working person, who puts forth great effort day to day in order to be able to give his family everything they need for a decent life.

He is a hard-working, responsible, and very honest man.  He started working as an itinerant salesman.  He traveled every day and dreamed of having a well-stocked store.  He now has his own business, and he has a customer base with good monthly income.

Carlos is requesting this loan to buy general supplies for his store.  He wants to be able to stock it with all types of products.  This way his customers will always be satisfied.

loans.use: to buy general supplies to stock his store.

loans.name: Safarbek

texts.ru:
Сафарбек - житель района Яван - начинает новый бизнес. Он собирается заняться куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Для ведения данного бизнеса он создал все условия. При дворе дома Сафарбек построил коровник, запасся кормом для скота, и теперь осталось только закупить скот. Для осуществления данного намерения он просит кредит, так как его сбережения не хватает. На сумму кредита Сафарбек собирается купить 4 голов крупнорогатого скота. 
К тому же Сафарбек является садоводом. У него имеется участок земли, где растут яблони. Он будет совмещать садоводство с животноводством. По словам Сафарбека, работа садовода сезонная и поэтому он начинает новый бизнес чтобы обеспечить себя постоянной работой.
texts.en: Safarbek is a resident of the region of Yavan, and is starting a new business in the purchase and selling of cattle.  He has given all of his effort to start this business - near Safarbek's home he has built a barn and feeding troughs, and now all that is left is to purchase cattle.  He is asking for a loan to accomplish this because he lacks personal savings.  With money from the loan, Safarbek plans to buy 4 head of cattle.  Up until now, Safarbek worked in gardening.  He has a plot of land on which grow apple trees, and wants to combine gardening and animal husbandry.  According to Safarbek, gardening is seasonal work, and he is starting his new business so that he can be working constantly.

loans.use: to purchase 4 head of cattle

loans.name: Herminia

texts.en: Herminia is a 47-year-old married woman from Cortes, Bohol. Her husband works as a farmer and driver to provide for their family. Herminia, on the other hand, sells Avon products to augment their income. She also sells clothing in the community. Herminia is requesting a loan to buy more items to sell such as lotion, perfume, sandals, shoes and body talc. In the future, she hopes to save her income and be able to save for old age.

loans.use: to buy lotion, perfume, sandals, shoes and body talc.

loans.name: Silvia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Silvia, quiere aprovechar la temporada navideña para tener ingresos extras, por lo que está solicitando capital para invertirlo en la compra de vestidos, camisas, pantalones y ropa para niños, con esto su inventario se verá más surtido y ofrecerá a sus clientes mejores opciones de compra.
Con el crédito anterior ella fortaleció su negocio con diferentes estilos de ropa, permitiéndole satisfacer a sus clientes, tener más ventas y obtener ingresos con los cuales cancelar sus cuotas, así mismo dar a su familia un estilo de vida diferente.
texts.en:
Silvia wants to take advantage of the Christmas season to earn extra income, thus she is soliciting capital to invest in the purchase of dresses, shirts, pants and children’s clothing. This inventory will allow her to offer her customers better options for shopping.

She used the earlier loan to strengthen her business with different kinds of clothing. which allowed her to satisfy her customers and make more sales. Her earnings enabled her to pay her debts and give her family a different lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase dresses, shirts, pants and children's clothing.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, es casado, no tiene hijos, vive con su esposa, aprendió de su tía a vender ropa como un medio para generar ganancias, desde hace tres años es independiente en el negocio, lo realiza todos los días junto a su esposa.
El crédito lo utilizara para comprar ropa para dama y caballero, y así aprovechar esta la época navideña, espera aumentar las ventas, tener mejores ingresos, atraer nuevos clientes, cancelar la deuda adquirida y tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Sueña con fortalecer más su negocio y formar un patrimonio para su esposa y sus futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Carlos is married and lives with his wife. He doesn't have any children. He learned how to sell clothing as a means to generate profit from his aunt. He has been running his own business for three years now and works every day alongside his wife.

He will use this loan to buy men and women's clothing and make the most of the Christmas season. He expects sales to increase, income to improve, and also to reach more customers. This will allow him to pay off the debt and have better living standards.

His dream is to further strengthen his business and develop an estate for his wife and future children.

loans.use: to buy men and women's clothing.

loans.name: Tarikhan

texts.ru: Тарихан 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Тарихан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Тарихан занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Тарихан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 50 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тарихан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Тарихан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Tarikhan is 49 years old, married, and, with her spouse, is raising 3 children.  Tarikhan has a secondary education.  Tarikhan's work in animal husbandry, which began 20 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to thTarikhan's hard work, she now has in her herd 3 milk cows and 50 sheep.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Tarikhan turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the income from the loan Tarikhan plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd, and also plans to save towards her children's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Bubuaisha

texts.ru: Бубуайше 61 год, вдова, одна воспитывает сына. У Бубуайши - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бубуайша занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бубуайши, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 нетели, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бубуайша обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Бубуайша планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Bubuaisha is 61 years old, widowed, and is raising her son alone.  Bubuaisha has a secondary education.  Bubuaisha's work in animal husbandry, which began 18 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Bubuaisha's hard work, her herd now contains 1 milk cow, 2 heifers, and 5 sheep.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Bubuaisha turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the income from the loan, Bubuaisha plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Gulsyina

texts.ru: Гулсыйне 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 сына. У Гулсыйны - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулсыйна занимается животноводством, стартовав 3 года назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулсыйны, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулсыйна обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулсыйна планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение сына.
texts.en: Gulsyina is 32 years old and she is married with one son.  She has a high school education and she raises livestock as the main source of income for her family.  She started this business three years ago with the purchase of livestock for 10,000 som KGS.  Thanks to her hard work, Gulsyina now has two dairy cows and ten sheep on her farm.  Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of developing her business further, Gulsyina has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to buy cows to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to use the income from the loan to further increase her head of livestock, as well as to save up money for her son's education.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Mujeres Del Rosario (Women Of The Rosary) Group

texts.en:
The six women of this group live in Margaritas del Rosario, Suchitepéquez, Guatemala.  They named their group in honor of the Virgin from their church, which unfortunately was stolen some years ago.  These are all hard-working women who are eager for the opportunity to be in Namaste’s business development program where they will work with a business advisor, take classes in managing their finances, and receive a small loan.  The businesses they have include sales of food, vegetables, fruits, and second-hand clothing.  There is also a seamstress. 

Angelica Maria (3rd from left) is 25 years old and lives with her domestic partner and their daughter, who goes to school.  She and her partner share household and family expenses.  She has a sixth grade education but her family was poor and she was not able to follow her dream of learning to be a seamstress.  However, with the help of a neighbor she taught herself to sew and now has her own small tailor shop.  She has a very positive attitude and, having acquired the sewing skills she always wanted, she is eager to acquire the business skills that will help her be successful in her business.

She plans to invest her loan money in new fabric so she can make more of the beautiful blouses typical of her area of Guatemala.  At the moment, she has monthly profits of 751 Guatemalan Quetzales (around US $95), working 70 hours per month.  She is aiming at an increase of 8% in profits over the course of her nine-month cycle with Namaste.

loans.use: to buy more fabric for producing the typical blouses of her area

loans.name: Ronald Christian

texts.es: Ronald es un joven emprendedor de 23 años de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Es hijo único y vive con la familia de su mamá. Estudió en el colegio estatal “Bolívar”, al culminar el colegio comenzó la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial en la universidad pública. Con mucho sacrificio por la distancia de su casa a la universidad, logró ser un estudiante sobresaliente lo que le hizo merecedor del premio a la innovación en su carrera. Actualmente trabaja en una fábrica de plásticos, cuyos ingresos los utiliza principalmente para apoyar económicamente en los gastos de su hogar. Él solicita un crédito educativo para realizar el master en Pequeñas y Medianas Empresas con lo cual complementará sus actuales conocimientos y así podrá cumplir su sueño de tener su propia fábrica de plásticos y de esta manera mejorar su situación económica para mantener a su mamá, y a toda su familia, que fueron su fuente de inspiración y apoyo a lo largo de toda su vida. Agradece a todas las personas que hace posible que se supere.
texts.en:
Ronald is an enterprising young man. He is 23 years old and is from the city of Cochabamba. He is an only child and lives with his mother's family. He went to Bolívar state school, and after finishing there he started studying Industrial Engineering at the public university. With lots of effort and sacrifice due to the distance between his home and the university, he managed to become an outstanding student, which earned him his class' innovation award. He currently works for a plastic factory and uses his income mainly to contribute financially to his household. 

He is requesting an education loan in order to get his master's degree in Small and Medium-sized Business Administration, which will supplement his current knowledge in order to achieve his dream of having his own plastic factory and improving his financial situation so that he can support his mother and the whole family, since they were his source of inspiration and support during his whole life. He is grateful to all the people who make it possible for him to improve himself.

loans.use: to finance his master's degree in Small and Medium-sized Business Administration.

loans.name: Eftihi

texts.en: Eftihi is seeking your financial help for the first time, but she has been VFA’s client for long time and has proved to be very reliable. She is a vulnerable Egyptian whose husband was struck by a car recently and she needs to take him to the hospital. Thus, your kindness will help them cover the medical costs. Eftihi and her husband fall under the poverty level. This holiday season they had nothing to celebrate with her husband in physical pain, Eftihi emotionally struggling with her husband’s condition, and because they haven't saved money to cover the medical expenses. Eftihi is asking for your kindness and generosity.

loans.use: to cover medical expenses for her husband who was struck by a vehicle recently.

loans.name: Kuña Pyryry Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pyryry está en su ciclo 15  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al trabajo de todas y a su esfuerzo, están mejorando bastante y superando sus privaciones.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Mirta, quien vende todo tipo de lencerías, y comenta que ya tiene una clientela formada que siempre compra de ella sus prendas, ya que son de muy buena calidad y a bajo costo. Ella es una persona responsable que siempre quiere trabajar y esta con muy buen espíritu emprendedor.
Pide este préstamo para comprar prendas de lencería para poder venderlas y cumplir con sus clientes. Esta agradecida por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras reciben de ir superándose cada dia.
texts.en:
Kuña Pyryry is in its 15th loan cycle in the women’s committee program where they all work to help each other get ahead. They are conducting a poverty elimination survey, where, thanks to everyone’s work and effort, they are all improving quite a bit and overcoming their deprivations.

Sra. Mirta is one of the members who sells all kinds of lingerie. She notes that she already has a customer base that always buys items from her becaise they are of very high quality and at a low price. She is a responsible person who always wants to work and
who displays an enterprising spirit.

She is requesting this loan to purchase lingerie to sell and to meet her customers’ demands. She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her co-workers will receive so they can continue improving themselves every day.

loans.use: to purchase lingerie items to sell.

loans.name: Zulema Lisseth

texts.es:
Zulema, vive junto a su suegra y sus hijos, para mejorar la calidad de vida familiar se dedica hacer pan dulce para vender de forma ambulante por el mercado de su localidad, tiene un horario de 5:00 a.m. a 12:00 p.m., todos los días.
Invertirá en la compra de harina, levadura, azúcar y algunos repuestos para el horno, fortalecerá su negocio ya que le ayudara a continuar trabajando, sus ventas aumentaran tendrá mejores ganancias con las que piensa cancelar sus cuotas y cubrir los gastos familiares.
Sueña con que sus hijos tengan una buena calidad de vida y oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Zulema lives with her mother-in-law and children. In order to improve the family’s quality of life, she makes pastries to sell as a street vendor at the local market. Her schedule is from 5 a.m. to 12 p.m. daily.

She will invest in the purchase of flour, yeast, sugar and some replacement parts for the over. She will strengthen her business, which will help her to continue working. Her sales will increase and she will earn more profit, with which she intends to pay her debts and cover family expenses.

She dreams that her children will have a good quality of life and the opportunity to study for a university degree.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, sugar and some replacement parts for her oven.

loans.name: Walter Osmin

texts.es:
Walter, vive con su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de un año y medio, es el principal responsable del sustento de familia, es un agricultor que se dedica a sembrar granos básicos, lo hace solo, en ocasiones cuando el trabajo es mucho paga mano de obra para que le ayuden, lo hace todos los días de 6:00 a.m. a 12 p.m., hasta la fecha no ha tenido ninguna dificultad en su negocio.
En esta ocasión lo invertirá en el pago de mano de obra para recolectar su cosecha, de esta manera podrá contar en menos tiempo con su producción, espera poder ofrecer su producto en esta época para aprovechar que las ventas aumentan, tener mejores ganancias y cancelar las deudas.
Sueña con darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Walter, lives with his life partner and their small daughter who is one-and-a-half years old. Walter is primarily responsible for providing for the family. He works in agriculture, sowing basic grains. He works alone and for the occasions when there is a lot of work, he pays laborers to help him. Walter works from 6 a.m. to 12 p.m. each day. So far, he has not had any difficulties with his business. 

On this occasion, Walter will invest the money to pay for laborers to help him collect his harvest. In this way, he can collect his crops faster. He hopes to start selling his products in this season in order to take advantage of the increased sales. Then he will have better earnings and will pay off his debts. Walter dreams of giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for labor to collect his harvest.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: La señora Valentina tiene 47 años, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos que aun dependen de ella, estudio hasta nivel primario ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos. Actualmente vive en el Trópico de Cochabamba  y cuenta con un terreno donde cultiva banano, cuando obtiene una buena cosecha, entrega sus productos para exportación, pero generalmente  comercializa al mercado interno. Debido a que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente, solicita un crédito para realizar un mantenimiento de su banano con fertilizante orgánico (gallinaza), de esta forma podrá aumentar el rendimiento y mejorar la producción para dedicarse a exportar sus productos, lo que le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos y paralelamente mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en: Valentina is 47 years old, and married with four dependent children.   She has a primary school education because her parents had limited financial resources. She is currently living in “Trópico de Cochabamba” and has land where she grows bananas.  When she yields a good harvest, she delivers her products for export, but generally sells to the domestic market.  Because she doesn’t have sufficient funds, she is requesting a loan to maintain her banana crops with organic fertilizer (hen droppings).  In this way, she will be able to increase yields, improve production, and export her products, which will help her increase her income and improve her standard of living at the same time.

loans.use: to maintain banana crops with organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Jose Gregorio

texts.es:
José, pertenece a una familia compuesta por su esposa y sus dos hijos, para generar los ingresos para cubrir los gastos familiares, se dedica a elaborar pan y venderlo, es un oficio que aprendió en cursos impartidos en su localidad, sus horarios son de 3:00 a.m. a 8:00 a.m. y de 2:00 p.m. a 6:00 p.m., hasta la fecha no le ha representado ningún problema dicho negocio.
Invertirá en la compra de azúcar, harina, levadura y canela, para mejorar la producción, espera ofrecer un pan de calidad a sus clientes, aumentar su recorrido, tener más ventas y aumentar sus ganancias con las podrá cancelar sus cuotas y mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar
Aspira ampliar su negocio y tener una mejor rentabilidad.
texts.en:
José's family includes his wife and their two children. In order to generate the income he needs to cover his family's expenses, he works making and selling baked goods. He learned this trade by taking some courses offered locally. His work schedule is from 3:00 am to 8:00 am and from 2:00 pm to 6:00 pm. So far his business has not run into any problems.

He will invest in purchasing sugar, flour, yeast, and cinnamon, in order to improve production. He expects to offer his customers quality baked goods, expand his route, make more sales, and increase his profit so that he can pay his installments and improve his family's living standards.

His goal is to expand his business and achieve higher profitability.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, yeast, and cinnamon.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosario, es acompañada, vive con sus dos hijos y su compañero de vida, con el deseo de apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar por iniciativa propia empezó  a vender productos de revista, es una actividad que no es difícil para ella realizarla.
Invertirá en la compra de lociones, cremas corporales, cosméticas, con lo que aprovechara la época navideña ya que es cuando aumentan las ventas, espera responder a las demandas de sus clientes, incrementar sus ingresos con los que cancelara las cuotas y seguir apoyando en los gastos familiares.
Sueña con hacer crecer su negocio y ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosario lives with her two children and her life partner. Because she wanted to help her family with household expenses, on her own initiative she started selling catalog products, a business which is not difficult for her to carry out.

She will invest in purchasing creams, body lotions, and cosmetics, in order to make the most of the Christmas season, since that is when her sales increase. She expects to meet her customers' demand and increase her income, which she will use to pay her installments and continue helping out with family expenses.

Her dream is to expand her business and add on to her home.

loans.use: to buy creams, body lotions, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sabari Kadi Group

texts.fr:
Mme MARCELINE représente le groupe SABARI KADI. Elle se porte bien. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 07ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. 01 va à l’école.
Elle vend des habits depuis 02ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10.Ses clients sont les femmes et les hommes.
Elle veut s’acheter 05douzaines d’habits, 06pièces de pagnes et 03douzaines de tenues pour bébé.
Mme veut épargner ses  bénéfices. Elle ambitionne étendre la limite de son activité, mieux entretenir de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. Marceline represents the Sabari Kadi group. She is doing well. She is married and the mother of two children. The oldest is seven years old and goes to school, and the youngest is three years old

She has been selling clothes for the past two years. She gets her supplies from the market in sector 10, and her clients are both men and women.

She wants to buy five dozen sets of clothing, six lengths of pagnes (colorful West-African fabric) and three dozen baby outfits.

She wants to save her profits. Her ambition is to expand her business, and take better care of her family.

loans.use: buy five dozen sets of clothing, six lengths of pagnes (colorful West-African fabric) and three dozen baby outfits

loans.name: Butsabong

texts.en:
Butsabong was born in Payao Province, but her family migrated to Huay Hom Village in Phrae Province when she was a child.  They moved to a new community in search of better opportunities.  They hoped to find more land for farming and to ensure their children could attend school. 

Butsabong was able to earn an education in the Provincial boarding school and graduated from the 9th grade.  Butsabong is proud of her education and of the opportunities it has opened up for her as a young woman.

Her family is from the Sankue clan, but she has now married into the Sangwang clan and she is excited to build a shared life and family with her husband.  They are close with their families and want to raise their children in their community near their parents. 

For young people, even ones like Butsabong with an education, options can be limited.  With farming land ever more scarce, young people can be forced to seek work in distant cities (and become vulnerable to exploitation). 

Butsabong is one of the youngest hammock weavers in the village -- it is incredibly exciting that an educated, energetic young woman like Butsabong has found weaving to be a rewarding, secure career.  She is excited that her loan will help her achieve a secure financial footing, learn more about budgeting and begin planning for her family’s future.

loans.use: to invest in her hammock weaving and contribute to her family’s income.

loans.name: Jularat

texts.en:
Jularat was born in a village in rural northeastern Thailand, but she had to move to Bangkok to search for work when she got older.  She met her husband, who is a member of the Hmong tribe, while working in a factory in Bangkok.  Factory life was difficult and they both missed living close to their families and communities.

After their marriage, Jularat and her husband decided to return to her husband’s village to look after his aging parents.  For Jularat, who speaks Thai, it was a difficult adjustment to move to the Hmong village, where she did not speak the language or have any of her old friends.  There weren’t many job opportunities relevant to her background in factory work - almost every person in the community worked as a field laborer.

When Jularat learned about the opportunity to weave hammocks, she was excited about the creative work and the healthy income she could earn.  With her weaving skills, she is looking forward to becoming a strong provider for her family and providing comfort for her in-laws as they age.  This loan will enable her to develop her hammock weaving business and plan for a brighter future for herself and her loved ones.

loans.use: to develop her hammock weaving business and plan for a brighter future for herself and her loved ones.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra es una joven madre de 1 pequeño de 2 años de edad, por lo cual ella trabaja mucho para poder darle lo necesario para poder vivir, Sandra trabaja en una institución de su ciudad atendiendo a los clientes que visitan dicha empresa, Sandra trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable.

Sandra esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias  a la ayuda que le están brindando ella podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder mejorar su vivienda y de esta manera brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su sueño:”Darle una profesión a su hija”.
texts.en:
Sandra is a young mother of a two-year-old child. She works hard in order to give her child everything they need in order to live. Sandra works for a company in her city, tending to the customers that come in. Sandra works around nine hours a day and believes the reason why things are going well for her at work is because she is very responsible.

Sandra is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are offering her she will be able to buy construction materials in order to improve her home so that she can give her family a better quality of life and keep fighting to achieve her dream, which is for her daughter to have a career.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Francisca Del Carmen

texts.es:
Francisca, se dispone a recolectar la cosecha de maíz y necesita pagar la mano de obra y una maquina desgranadora, para dar agilidad a su negocio y de esa manera recibir en menor tiempo las ganancias para seguir invirtiendo en el negocio y en los gastos familiares.
Con el crédito anterior fortaleció el negocio, tuvo una cosecha abundante y de calidad, sus ventas aumentaron, y sus ingresos son mejores, ha cancelado sus cuotas y da a su familia un ambiente lleno de una mejor alimentación, educación, vestuario y salud.
texts.en: Francisca is getting ready to collect her corn crops and she needs to pay for labor and a machine to husk corn. This will make her business more flexible and help her to reap her earnings faster so that she can keep investing in the business and paying her family's expenses. With her previous loan, she strengthened her business and had an abundant, good-quality crop. Her sales grew, as did her income. Francisca has paid her debts and she has been able to provide her family with an environment of better food, education, clothing and health.

loans.use: to pay for labor and a machine to husk her corn.

loans.name: Milton Eliezer

texts.es: Milton tiene 28 años de edad, casado y padre de un hijo. Originario de la ciudad de Boaco. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la compra y venta de piedra cantera. Inicio este negocio hace pocos años, con dinero propio que obtuvo de una liquidación de su trabajo anterior; así fue creciendo con su negocio. Hoy en día cuenta con un negocio amplio y lleno de piedras canteras. Su meta próxima es comprar piedra canteras con el nuevo crédito. Solicita el crédito para comprar piedras canteras para su negocio, con el fin de seguir extendiendo su materia prima. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá realizar más ventas y obtener más ganancias. Su plan futuro es ahorrar para instalar un quiosco para su esposa.
texts.en:
Milton is 28 years old, married, and has one son. He is originally from the city of Boaco. He is a businessman and earns a living by buying and selling quarry stone. He started this business a few years ago using the severance pay that he received from a previous job, and he has gradually grown his business. Today he has a large business with a lot of quarry stone. 

His next goal is to buy quarry stone with the new loan. He is requesting the loan in order to buy more stone for his business and continue increasing the amount of raw material. He believes that the loan will be of much help to him, as it will allow him to increase sales and earn more money. 

Milton's plan for the future is to save money to construct a kiosk for his wife.

loans.use: to buy quarry stone.

loans.name: Edith Yaneth

texts.es:
Edith, es  madre soltera vive con sus padres, para aportar en los gastos familiares se dedica a vender tortillas  y ropa de forma independiente, es un oficio que aprendió de sus madre, ya tiene tres años de experiencia en su negocio y a la fecho no ha tenido ningún problema.
Utilizará el capital para comprar leña, maíz, bolsas y variedad de ropa, le permitirá su materia prima para las tortillas así como también surtirá el inventario de la venta de ropa por ser fechas de fin de año es el momento preciso para aumentar sus ventas, espera tener más ganancias ya que necesita ingresos extras para continuar apoyando con los gastos familiares.
Anhela poder comprar su propia vivienda para darle un patrimonio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Edith is a single mother who lives with her parents. To help out with household expenses, she independently sells tortillas and clothing. She learned the business from her mother. She now has three years of experience and hasn't had any problems to date. 

Edith will use the loan to buy firewood, corn, bags, and a variety of clothing. This will provide her with the raw materials for the tortillas, as well as increase her clothing inventory. The end of the year is the best time to increase sales. She hopes to earn more money, as she needs extra money to continue helping with the household expenses. 

Edith dreams of being able to buy her own house that she can leave to her son.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, bags, and a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae has lived through dramatic strife and many changes over the course of her life in northern Thailand.  She was born in Songkwaa, a Hmong village that was “resettled” by the Thai government during the communist uprising.  When she grew up, she married a man who lived in Huay Hom Village and together they helped found a new community in Phrae Province. 

After many years of hard work in the fields and raising her family, Mae has reached the age when Hmong women would traditionally transition to “retirement” pursuits, like cooking for grandchildren and sewing clothes for their families.  With the onset of store-bought clothing and prepared food, many older Hmong women feel left behind and worry that they are a burden to their families. 

In light of her changing circumstances, Mae jumped at the chance to weave hammocks.  Weaving is less demanding than field work, more flexible in scheduling and pays far more than a laborer could earn.  With this loan, Mae will be able to take her weaving work to the next level, begin building a retirement nest egg and feel fully financially empowered (through both financial training and economic security).

loans.use: to invest in raw materials so she can secure consistent weaving work and increase her income potential.

loans.name: Panida

texts.en:
Panida was born and raised in a Hmong community in the northern part of Nan Province.  For Panida’s family and many others, life in the hill tribe community was very tough.  When Panida was married, she moved with her husband to a new Hmong settlement in Phrae Province, a village called Huay Hom. 

In Huay Hom, Panida and her fellow villagers toiled in backbreaking field labor.  She has had to scrape by on planting small amounts of corn, cabbage and other cash crops, without any ability to save for the future or plan for her family’s growth.  With the opportunity to weave hammocks full-time, Panida finally feels like she has work that she enjoys and that lets her show off her talent for weaving!

As a weaver, Panida is most excited that she will have security and the power to control her future.  For her, this loan represents the beginning of a new era in financial empowerment.  She is excited about being a part of the Kiva community and proud to be learning more about finances.

loans.use: to get her own hammock production going and become an independent producer.

loans.name: Margarita Nivia

texts.es: La señora Margarita es una persona trabajadora y responsable, tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales tres ya son independientes y su hija menor que está en la universidad aun vive con ella,todos estos años tuvo que salir adelante sola, tiene mucha experiencia en la cocina y especialmente en lo relacionado a comida rápida y por el tiempo que lleva con la concesión de comedores es que tiene bastante conocimiento de atención al público. Trabaja todos los días en un snack elaborando comida y  los fines de semana y días feriados en el restaurant de su amiga, a quien le colabora con la atención a los clientes y la limpieza del lugar. Para mejorar la atención del Snack solicita un crédito para la compra de un freezer, una cocina y una garrafa, de esta forma podrá mejorar su servicio y obtener más ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su familia.
texts.en: Margarita is a hardworking and responsible person. She has four children, three of which are independent. Her youngest daughter is studying in a university but still lives with Margarita. All of these years, Margarita has had to move forward by herself. She has a lot of experience in the kitchen and especially in everything related to fast food because of the time she has spent working in this area. She has much knowledge of serving the public. Margarita works every day in a snack shop, making food. On the weekends and on holidays she ask works in her friend's restaurant, helping to serve clients and keep the restaurant clean. In order to better maintain her snack shop, Margarita is requesting a loan to buy a freezer, a kitchen and a carafe. In this way, she will be able to improve her service and obtain more earnings to cover her family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, a kitchen, and a carafe.

loans.name: Vilda

texts.es:
La señora Vilda tiene 53 años, es casada  tiene tres  hijos, por quienes ella se está esforzando, es por eso que trabaja muy duro.
La señora Vilda tiene  una mercería bien surtida, buena ubicación, y además de eso siempre tiene todo tipo de productos bien variados para poder dar a su clientela todo lo que pide. Cuenta que se inició teniendo una despensa y después cambió de rubro, que hasta hoy le va muy bien.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas, calzados, artículos de bazar y demás.
texts.en: Vilda is 53 years old. She is married with three children, for whom she is works very hard. Vilda has a small shop that is well-stocked and in a good location. She always has many kinds of products so that she can give her customers anything they may ask for. In addition, she has a grocery store. After she changed the entrance, business has been very good. Vilda is requesting this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of garments, shoes, bazaar items and more.

loans.use: to buy garments, shoes, bazaar items, and more.

loans.name: Floren Marlene

texts.es:
Floren, es una madre soltera emprendedora que hasta el momento ha sacado adelante a su hija, vive junto a su hija en una casa familiar, la forma que tiene de obtener los ingresos con los que cubre sus gastos y los de su hija es atender su negocio de comedor, el cual inicio en sociedad con su hermana hoy lo hace de manera independiente.
Comprará aceite, arroz, carnes, embutidos, frijol, verduras, bebidas, en fin todo lo necesario para continuar elaborando los diferentes tipos de comida, el resto lo invertirá en mejorar el local para dar un imagen más agradable a los clientes permanentes así como nuevos, espera aprovechar la temporada de navidad, aumentar sus ventas, mejorar los ingresos para mejorar las condiciones familiares.
Sueña con tener un negocio más competitivo y con un buena rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Floren is an entrepreneurial single mother that up to now has been able to support her daughter. She lives with her daughter in a family house. She earns an income to cover her and her daughter's expenses looking after her cafeteria. She started the business in partnership with her sister but now she runs it independently.

She will buy oil, rice, meat, cold cuts, beans, vegetables, drinks - everything she needs to continue preparing the different types of food. The rest she will invest in improving the premises in order to project a more pleasant image to new and regular customers alike. She hopes to take advantage of the Christmas season to increase her sales and improve her income in order to improve conditions for her family.

She dreams of having a more competitive business with good profitability.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, meat, cold cuts, beans, vegetables and drinks.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es:
José, se dedica a vender cocos para dar el sustento diario a su familia, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo, es una actividad que la aprendió por cuenta propia, tiene 8 años de tener su negocio, vende en su casa y en el mercado.
Necesita comprar cocos, bolsas y otros insumos para su negocio, espera tener producto por mayor para seguir atendiendo a sus clientes, espera aprovechar la temporada de fin de año para generar más ingresos con los cueles podrá cancelar sus cuotas y cubrir sus gastos familiares.
Aspira ampliar su vivienda para que su familia viva en bajo un techo seguro y tenga mejor alimentación, vestuario y salud.
texts.en:
José works selling coconuts in order to provide for his family. He lives with his life partner and their son. He learned the business on his own and has had it for eight years. He makes his sales from home and at the market.

He needs to buy coconuts, bags, and other supplies for his business. He wants to stock up on products so that he can continue serving his customers and make the most of the holiday season by making more income, which will allow him to pay his installments and cover his family's expenses.

His goal is to add on to his home so that his family can live under a safe roof and have better nutrition, clothing, and health.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, bags, and other items.

loans.name: Jenny Fernanda

texts.es:
Ella es jenny fernanada tiene 18 años vive en bogotà con su mama, su padrastro, su hermano mayor, menor y su abuelita, realizo su primaria en el colegio "Francisco jose de caldas" y en el colegio" san basilio beato", realizo  su  bachillerato en el colegio "La toscana lisboa"  graduada en el año 2012, actualmente se dedica a estudiar auxiliar de enfermería en campo alto esta en segundo semestre y pasara a tercer semestre.
Le gusta estudiar esta carrera porque  le gusta ayudar a la humanidad,  a la gente que lo necesita y poder salvar mas gente, mas vidas, también estudia esta carrera porque es un paso que ella va a dar para poder brindarles lo mejor a sus pacientes y sus familiares.
debido a que no tiene los recursos para seguir pagando esta carrera ya que los costos aumentan, su mama no le puede colaborar con todo, entonces campo alto le brinda la oportunidad de poder estar en el programa kiva donde le dan la opción de pagar un poco menos para poder seguir estudiando y poder cumplir sus metas y sus propósitos.
texts.en:
Jenny Fernanada, age 18, lives in Bogotá with her mother, her stepfather, her older and younger brothers, and her grandmother.  She attended Francisco Jose de Caldas primary school and went to San Basilio Beato school.  She got her high school diploma from La Toscana Lisboa and graduated in 2012.  She is currently studying at Campo Alto to be a nursing assistant .  She is in her second semester and will go on to the third semester.

She likes studying this career because she likes to help humanity and the people who need it.  She likes being able to save more people and more lives.  She is also studying this career because it is a step that she will take in order to be able to provide the best to her patients and relatives.  

Because she does not have the resources to continue paying for her studies, and because the costs are increasing, her mother is not able to help with everything.  Therefore, Campo Alto is proving her with the opportunity to be able to be in the Kiva program, where they give her the option of paying a little less in order to be able to continue studying and to be able to achieve her goals and objectives.

loans.use: to complete her education.

loans.name: Maritza Cristina

texts.es:
Maritza de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato de nivel académico, es mamá soltera de dos hijos de 15 y 9 años de edad;  ya que el esposo la dejo cuando él llego a los estados unidos. Sus dos hijos están en la escuela.

Maritza se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos, como yuca frita, enredos y tostadas;  este negocio lo tiene desde hace 3 años, lo aprendió sola ya que vive frente a un poli deportivo y detecto la oportunidad de vender ese tipo de productos, ya que llegan más personas de otros lugares; pero también trabaja como ordenanza en una escuela que está en el municipio desde las 6 a las 12 del mediodía y en las tarde ella prepara los ricos antojitos para ir a venderlos junto con sus dos hijos.

El préstamo que esta solicitado en la Fundación Campo, es para  comprar las mochilas y todo los útiles escolares  para sus hijos, para la época del  estudio que ya se avecina y en este momento los precios son relativamente más bajos que el próximo año.
 
Los sueños que tiene para su negocio, son instalar un negocio más fuerte, que los que les visiten se vayan muy contentos  y como madre soltera sacar adelante  a sus hijos y que se superen  y terminen una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Maritza is forty years old. Her highest level of education is high school. She is a single mother of two children, who are ages fifteen and nine. Her husband left her when he arrived in the United States. Both children are in school.

Maritza works selling traditional food items like fried yuca, enredos, and tostadas. She has been in this business for three years and learned it on her own. She lives across the street from a sports complex and saw the opportunity of selling this type of products, since a lot of people come from other areas. But she also works at a local school from 6:00 am to 12 pm. In the afternoons she prepares her delicious snacks and goes out to sell them with her two children.

She will use the loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo to buy backpacks and school supplies for her children, because the new school season is approaching and currently prices are relatively lower than next year. 
 
Her dreams for her business are to make it stronger and for her customers to leave very happy. As a mother, what she wants is to raise her children and for them to make the most of themselves and get a college education.

loans.use: to buy backpacks and school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Tania Maria

texts.es: Doña Tania es originaria es originaria de la ciudad de Boaco, casada y madre de dos hijos. De 41 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Negocio que inicio hace dos años, vendiendo gaseosas y golosinas y otros pocos productos. Luego, poco a poco fue comprando demás productos. Actualmente cuenta con su pequeña pulpería, el cual le ha generado entradas de dinero para su hogar. Su meta próxima es comprar un estante para extender más sus productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, gaseosas, entre otros, con el fin de surtir su mercadería. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ofrecer una variedad de productos y aumentar sus ventas. Su plan futuro es seguir ampliando su negocio y comprar un frezeer para vender todo tipo de carne.
texts.en:
Tania, 41, is a native of the city of Boaco.  She is married and is the mother of 2 children.  Tania works as a merchant.  She has a grocery store that she started up 2 years ago, selling soft drinks, snacks, and other products.  Later, she gradually started buying other types of products.  Now she has a small grocery store that has generated inflows of money for her household.  

Tania's next goal is to buy shelving to exhibit more products.  She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, soft drinks, and other products to stock her store with merchandise.  She expects that this loan will be a great help to her, because she will be able to offer a greater variety of products and thereby increase her sales.  In the future, Tania plans to continue to expand her business and buy a freezer so that she can sell all types of meat.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, soft drinks, and other products

loans.name: Wanida

texts.en:
Wanida is a progressive and educated Hmong woman.  Her parents migrated to Huay Hom Village before she was born, searching for a better life in Phrae Province.  Land scarcity can be a big problem for poor farmers, so Wanida is part of a new generation born in the highlands of Phrae.  She and her family worked in the fields for many years as they tried to achieve stability in their new home. 

Wanida was able to earn an education and is one of the few hill tribe women to marry a Thai man instead of a member of her clan.  They spend equal time in each of their villages and appreciate each other’s cultures.  Wanida had dreams of a more stable, financially rewarding job, so she was very excited to learn about the opportunity to weave hammocks.  Along with many of members of her community, she has become a talented artisan weaver. 

Now Wanida is hoping to take the next step as a businesswoman.  She is taking part in the financial training programs that are part of the Yellow Leaf + Kiva partnership and she is excited to manage her household budget, plan for the future and even open her first bank account.  This loan will help Wanida become a more independent artisan and prepare for a successful future.

loans.use: to become a more independent artisan and prepare for a successful future.

loans.name: Karla Alejandra

texts.es:
Karla tiene 30 años de edad de estado civil Unión Libre tiene tres hijos vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Recinto Desvió De los Amarillo perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla PEQUEÑOS AGRICULTORES se encuentra ubicada el  recinto Desvió de los Amarillos, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Karla se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y cerdos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, urea, abonos, además alimento para los animales balanceados. 

Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

Enfrenta desafios el clima por que  es muy variado.

El sueño es seguir trabajando en la agricultura para reunir dinero para salir de viaje del pais.
texts.en:
Karla is 30 years old, is in a common law marriage and has three children. She lives with her husband and children at the Recinto Desvió De los Amarillo which is part of the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

She's part of the PEQUEÑOS AGRICULTORES (small farmers) communal bank which is located in the Desvió de los Amarillos enclosure in Ventanas and carries out agricultural and livestock activities.

Karla is a farmer, cultivating maize and breeding animals such as chicken and pigs. With this loan she will buy raw materials such as fertilizers, urea and also animal feed to keep them on a balanced diet.

She will buy these in the city of Ventanas.

Her challenge is the weather as it is very variable.

Her dream is to keep working in agriculture and have enough money to be able to travel outside the country.

loans.use: fertilizers, urea and also animal feed to keep them on a balanced diet.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, es acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y su hija, es empleado, para obtener más ingresos los cuales necesita para dar un estilo de vida mejor a su familia posee una tienda y su madre le ayuda a atenderla.
Invertirá en la compra de golosinas, bebidas, productos de la canasta básica y algunos artículos para el hogar, de esta forma tendrá surtida la tienda para la temporada navideña, espera aumentar sus ventas, atraer a nuevos clientes, tener mejores ingresos y cancelar sus deudas (la foto fue tomada en su empleo como encargado de la caseta del malecon, no en su tienda).
Sueña con tener los recursos que le den la facilidad de comprar su casa propia.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his life partner and their daughter. They are both employed, but in order to make more income, which he needs in order to give his family a better lifestyle, he has a store and his mother helps him run it.

He will invest in purchasing sweets, drinks, basic food staples, and some household items. This will allow him to have the store well-stocked for the Christmas season. He expects to increase sales, attract new customers, have better income, and pay off his debts.  (This photo was taken at his place of work managing the pier, not in his store).

His dream is to have enough resources to buy a home.

loans.use: to buy sweets, drinks, basic food staples, and some household items.

loans.name: Justiniano

texts.es:
Justiniano, se decidió por otro crédito para surtir su inventario de repuestos de bicicletas, en esta oportunidad comprara parches, tubos, cadenas, pedales, etc., así como también hará algunas mejoras en su hogar, le permitirá continuar satisfaciendo a sus clientes.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo porque logro reparar los coches y comprar los repuestos necesarios para surtir su negocio, tiene clientes nuevos, da un mejor servicio a los clientes y su economía es mejor.
texts.en:
Justiniano decided to request another loan to stock his inventory of spare bicycle parts. This time he will buy patches, tubes, chains, pedals, etc., as well as make some improvements in his home. It will allow him to continue satisfying his customers.

He experienced a positive effect with the previous loan because he managed to repair the cars and purchase the necessary parts to supply his business. He has new customers, provides better service and his economic situation is has improved.

loans.use: to buy patches, tubes, chains, pedals, etc.

loans.name: Jose Gilberto

texts.es:
José, se encuentra descapitalizado por lo que socita un nuevo crédito para comprar variedad de repuestos para la reparación de aires acondicionados, refrigeradoras y lavadoras, le facilitara a fortalecer su negocio.
