Previously she worked in a tailor shop, where she realized that her strength was making costumes.  Her problem is she doesn't have anyone to take care of her young daughter, who currently goes to work with her.

The money Cristina's requesting is to buy supplies such as fabric, needles, and thread so she can keep on making curtains and costumes.

What Cristina has enjoyed most about working with Fondo Esperanza is meeting people from different backgrounds, meeting with counselors who can help and support them, and sharing life experiences, which is a big help.

loans.use: to buy fabric, needles, and thread

loans.name: Edwin Edgar

texts.es: El  señor  Edwin  tiene 32 años, es soltero y vive en su propia casa, desde muy joven trabajo junto a sus padres ayudando en sus negocios,ahora es independiente y se dedica al servicio del transporte  con una antigüedad de ocho años. Actualmente trabaja en una empresa de radio taxis en calidad de propietario de su vehículo, pero el mismo necesita un cambio, por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de una caja mecánica para su vehiculo, de esa manera podrá seguir trabajando y lograra obtener más ingresos.
texts.en: Edwin is 32 years old. He is single and lives in his own house. Since he was young, he has worked alongside his parents helping with their business. Now he is an adult and has made a living in the transportation service for the last eight years. Currently, he works in a radio taxi business of good quality. Edwin owns his own vehicle, but he needs to change it. That is why he is requesting this loan. He is requesting a loan to buy a cashier's box for his vehicle. This will help him to continue working and improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy a cashier's box for his vehicle.

loans.name: Celia Emelina

texts.es:
Celia, necesita capital para comprar arroz, frijol, aceite, maíz, carnes y verduras, con lo que continuara elaborando la comida y tamales que luego ofrece en su negocio.
La inversión anterior le ayudo a tener la materia prima para su negocio, le permitió tener más clientes, aumentar sus ventas y tener ingresos que necesita para continuar dando un estilo diferente a su familia. Sus hijos siguen estudiando y ella les da su apoyo.
texts.en:
Celia needs capital to buy rice, beans, cooking oil, corn, meats, and vegetables so she can continue making food and tamales that she sells in her business.

The previous investment helped her have ingredients for her business, that allowed her to have more customers, increase her sales, and have the income she needs to continue providing a different style to her family.  Her children continue to attend school and she can better support them.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Yesenia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yesenia, necesita capital para pagar mano de obra, que le ayude a recolectar la cosecha así como también trasladar a su casa, para poder percibir sus ganancias mucho más rápido.
Con el crédito anterior compro los insumos agrícolas necesarios, lo que le ayudo a mejorar su cosecha, tener una producción más grande, mejorar sus ventas y aumentar las ganancias. Por el momento su familia está muy saludable.
texts.en:
Yesenia needs money to pay for labor to help her with her harvest and transport it to her home so she can make a profit in less time.

She used her previous loan to buy needed farming supplies and this helped her improve her harvest, increase her production, and improve her sales and income.  Her family is very healthy at the moment.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Los Limones El Rodeo Group

texts.es:
La señora Ludy Aracely de estado civil casada. De edad 55 años. Curdó 5 años de educación primaria. Tiene 6 hijos y 3 de ellos estan estudiando. Se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde. Inició este negocio con el fin de apoyar a su esposo en la economía del hogar y a la fecha lleva  20 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de 5 docenas de pollos para engordarlos y luego venderlos, tambien compará concentrado para los mismos. Desea en el futuro contar con una granja de pollos de engorde y tambien ponedoras.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales de corral y al comercio.
texts.en:
Ludy Aracely is a married woman. She is 55 years old. She finished five years of elementary school education. Ludy Aracley has six children, three of whom are in school. She makes a living raising and fattening chickens. Ludy Aracely began working in this business 20 years ago in order to support her husband with the household finances. 

She organizes a group that is requesting a loan, which Ludy Aracey will use to buy five dozen chickens to fatten and later sell. She will also by concentrate for the chickens. She hopes in the future to own a chicken farm for fattening chickens and laying hens. 

The other members of the group make a living raising animals and in sales.

loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrate.

loans.name: Wilder

texts.es: El señor Wilder tiene 22 años de edad, vive en la casa de sus padres y ayuda con los gastos de su casa, desde hace tres años se dedica a prestar servicios como ayudante de carpintería en un taller, donde muestra responsabilidad y muchas ganas de superarse, actualmente solicita un crédito para la compra de muebles y enseres que le hacen falta, de esta manera podrá satisfacer sus necesidades y las de su familia para brindarles mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Wilder is 22 years old. He lives in his parents' house and helps with the household expenses. For three years, he has worked as an assistant carpenter in a shop, where he has shown responsibility and the desire to excel. Currently, he is requesting a loan in order to buy furniture and some basic tools that he needs. This will help him to meet his needs and those of his family so he can offer them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy furniture and basic tools.

loans.name: Mehriniso

texts.ru: Мехринисо 47-летняя замужняя женщина. Она проживает в селе Яванского района с мужем и детьми. Она домохозяйка и нигде не работает. В данный момент она готовится к открытию нового бизнеса. Мехринисо собирается выращивать крупнорогатый скот для дальнейшей продажи. По причине того, что она не имеет достаточного начального капитала, она обратилась за кредитом. Мехринисо просит в кредит 1500 долларов, чтобы купить трех голов крупнорогатого скота. У Мехринисо при дворе дома имеется старый сарай, который она будет использовать в качестве коровника. Кормом для скота она тоже уже запаслась. Ей осталось только закупить скот.
texts.en: Mehriniso is a 47 year-old married woman.  She lives in a village in the Yavan district with her husband and children.  She is a homemaker and is not employed anywhere.  At the present time, she is getting ready to open a new business.  Mehriniso plans to raise cattle for subsequent sale.  Because she does not have a sufficient initial capital, she requested this loan.  Mehriniso is requesting a loan in the amount of 1500 dollars to buy three heads of cattle.  Mehriniso has an old barn in a yard of her house, which she will use as a cowshed.  She has already stocked up on livestock feed.  She only has to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy three cows and start her own business

loans.name: Norbert

texts.ru:
Норберт не женат.  Он работает на ВЕТ «Автомотив» на должности мастера. Норберт учится на четвертом году обучения в колледже и ему тяжело насобирать всю сумму - 7,000 гривен - чтобы оплатить за весь год, как того требует колледж. Норберт надеется, что полученное образование поможет ему получить новую работу с большим доходом.

Норберт просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 5,000 гривен на обучение (а 2,000 гривен он собрал сам).
texts.en: Norbert is not married.  He works at a plant BET "Avtomotiv" as a technician.  Norbert is a fourth-year-student at a college and is having a hard time to get the entire sum  - 7,000 hryvnia - to pay tuition for the year as the college requires.  Norbert hopes that the obtained education will help him get a new job with a high income.  Norbert is requesting a loan in the amount of 5,000 hryvnia for education (and he saved 2,000 hryvnia on his own).

loans.use: to pay for education costs

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru: Улугбеку 29 лет. Он деятельный и трудолюбивый человек, проживающий в районе Яван. Улугбек зарабатывает на жизнь, работая таксистом. Он женат, имеет детей. Братья Улугбека занимаются бизнесом куплей-продажей крупнорогатого скота. Он видит какой это прибыльный бизнес и решил тоже начать данный бизнес. Улугбек накопил почти 700 долларов США. Недостающую сумму 800 долларов он просит в кредит. Улугбек на эти деньги собирается приобрести 4 голов бычков. Естественно в начале бизнеса ему будут помогать братья советами, то есть какую породу бычков лучше покупать, как выращивать и продавать. Поэтому он верит в успешность своего бизнеса и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Ulugbek is 29 years old.  He is an active and hardworking person living in the Yavan district.  Ulugbek earns a living working as a taxi driver.  He is married and has children.  Ulugbek's brothers are involved in reselling cattle.  He sees this as a profitable business and decided to also start this business.  Ulugbek saved almost 700 dollars.  He is requesting the remaining sum of 800 dollars as a loan.  Ulugbek plans to use this money to buy 4 heads of bulls.  Obviously, his brothers will be helping him with the business by advising him what breed of bulls to buy and how to raise and sell them.  This is why he believes in the success of his business and hopes for support.

loans.use: to buy four bulls and start his own animal husbandry business

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru: Умедчон позитивный молодой человек в возрасте 28 лет. Он родился и вырос в кишлаке. Умедчон женат и имеет троих детей. Сам он работает учителем в местной школе. Но так как он имеет большую семью, одной заработной платы, которую он получает в школе, недостаточно. Поэтому Умедчон начал свой маленький бизнес и надеется его расширить, чтобы получать достаточный доход. Он дополнительно занимается животноводством. Он также сотрудничает с Арванд уже давно, первый свой кредит он взял на покупку первого скота. Умедчон является добросовестным клиентом, который своевременно выплачивает свои обязательства по кредиту. Умедчон рассказывает, что после того, как он начал сотрудничество с Арванд, его жизнь изменилась в лучшую сторону и он благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.  Сейчас Умедчон хочет взять кредит на покупку скота, чтобы расширить свой бизнес и получать больше прибыли. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Umedjon is a positive young man, who is 28 years old.  He was born and raised in a village.  Umedjon is married and has three children.  He works as a teacher at a local school, but because he has a large family, the salary that he earns at the school is not enough.  This is why Umedjon started his own business and hopes to expand it in order to earn enough income.  He is additionally involved in animal husbandry.  He has also been partnering with Arvand for a long time.  He obtained his first loan to buy first livestock.  Umedjon is a conscientious client, who repays his loan responsibilities timely.  Umedjon says that after he started partnering with Arvand, his life changed for the better, and he thanks Arvand for the financial support.  Now Umedjon wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business and earn more profit.  He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Zafarjon

texts.ru: Зафарчон трудолюбивый и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 35 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Зафарчон со своей женой живут дружно и стараются воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми, он и его жена очень рады растить своих детей. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Зафарчон занимается своим бизнесом. Зафарчон  уже давно работает таксистом. У него имеется для этого собственный автомобиль. Но эта машина служит ему уже долгое время и много раз приходилось её чинить. Поэтому сейчас он планирует купить новую, более улучшенную машину для ведения и расширения своего бизнеса. Этот бизнес приносит Зафарчону хороший доход, но его хватает только на проживание. А для того, чтобы купить новую машину требуются денежные средства. Поэтому Зафарчон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку машины для ведения своего бизнеса. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Zafarjon is a hardworking and responsible 35 year-old man.  He is married and has three children.  Zafarjon and his wife live happily and try to raise their children to become good people.  He and his wife are very glad to be raising their children.  Zafarjon is involved in his own business in order to have an income for living.  Zafarjon has been working as a taxi driver for a long time.  He owns a car for this occupation, but this car has been serving him for a long time and had to be repaired many times.  This is why he is currently planning to purchase a new, improved car in order to run and expand his business.  This business yields a good income for Zafarjon, but it is only enough for living expenses.  And he needs money to buy a new car.  This is why Zafarjon came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy a car in order to run his business.  He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a new car

loans.name: Azizkhon

texts.ru: Азизхон деятельный, целеустремленный человек в возрасте 59 лет. Он живет в районе Яван с женой, четырьмя сыновьями, невестками и внуками. Азизхон сейчас начинает торговый бизнес. Он рядом со своим домом построил помещение для магазина и собирается заняться там продажей продуктов питания. Для этой цели Азизхону не хватает 1000 долларов и эту сумму он просит в кредит. На сумму кредита он собирается приобрести ассортимент продуктов питания. Азизхон открыв данный бизнес, хочет обеспечить жителей своего села свежими и качественными продуктами питания, а себя прибыльной работой.
texts.en: Azizkhon is an active and driven 59 year-old person.  He lives in the Yavan district with his wife, four sons, daughters-in-law and grandsons.  Azizkhon is currently starting his own retail business.  He built a space for a store near his house and plans to start selling food products there.  Azizkhon is short 1000 dollars to achieve his goal and is requesting this sum as a loan.  He plans to purchase a selection of food products with this loan.  Having opened this business, Azizkhon wants to provide residents of his village with fresh and quality food products and himself with profitable work.

loans.use: to buy food products and open his own store

loans.name: Mahmadrajabi

texts.ru: Махмадрачаби начинающий предприниматель, живет в районе Яван. Ему 53 года. Он в течение нескольких лет ездил со своими сыновьями в Россию на заработки. Теперь он решил больше не покидать свою страну и здесь открыть собственный бизнес. Махмадрачаби планирует заняться продажей мужской одежды. Он уже в хорошем месте взял в аренду помещение и будет использовать его в качестве магазина продажи мужской одежды. Однако чтобы начать свой бизнес Махмадрачаби нуждается в кредите. Он просит в кредит 3000 долларов США. Махмадрачаби собирается на сумму кредита закупить коллекцию сезонной мужской одежды. Он будет привозить товар с оптового рынка города Душанбе и продавать в своем магазине в районе Яван по розничной цене. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку. Если он откроет бизнес, он обеспечит себя и своих сыновей работой, и им больше не придется покидать страну и скитаться по чужим краям в поисках работы. В канун Нового Года Махмадрачаби верит в чудо и в осуществлении своих намеченных целей.
texts.en: Mahmadrajabi is a beginner entrepreneur, living in the Yavan district.  He is 53 years old.  He spent several years going to Russia with his sons for work.  Now he decided not to leave his country anymore and open his own business here.  Mahmadrajabi plans to get involved in selling men's clothing, however, Mahmadrajabi needs a loan to start his business.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 3000 US dollars.  Mahmadrajabi plans to use this loan to buy a collection of seasonal men's clothing.  He will bring merchandise from a wholesale market in the city of Dushanbe and sell it at his own store in the Yavan district at a retail price.  He is hoping for Your support.  If he opens his business, he will provide himself and his sons with work, and they will no longer have to leave their country and travel foreign lands searching for work.  At the onset of the New Year, Mahmadrajabi believes in a miracle and making his set goals come true.

loans.use: to buy seasonal men's clothing and start his own business

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
This is Juliet. She previously accessed a 13,000 PHP loan that she used to buy products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings for her food stall. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in meeting the family's personal, household and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 17,000 PHP loan to purchase raw ingredients and supplies needed in her business. Her profits will definitely help her  sustain her daily needs and pay educational expenses for her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Juliet hopes that her business will thrive and dreams to have a happy and abundant life. She meets up with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients, like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables, and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимчон  трудолюбивый и добродушный мужчина в возрасте 42 лет.  Он женат и имеет троих детей. Он родился и по сей день живёт в горном кишлаке. С самого детства он обучался у своего отца животноводству. Он набрал столько опыта, что сейчас он самостоятельно  ведёт данный бизнес и тем самым получает хороший и стабильный доход. Олимчон также является клиентом Арванд, и  является ответственным клиентом. На сегодня он уже вырастил и продал скот, которых имел. Полученную прибыль он потратил на обеспечение своих детей. И сейчас Олимчон желает закупить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Olimjon is a hardworking and kind 42 year-old person.  He is married and has three children.  He was born still lives in a mountaineous village.  Since childhood, he had learned animal husbandry from his father.  He gained so much experience that now he is running this business by himself and earns a good and stable income with it.  Olimjon is also a client of Arvand and is a responsible client.  Today, he has already raised and sold livestock that he had.  He spent the resulting profit on providing for his children.  And now Olimjon wishes to buy several more heads of livestock for fattening up and subsequent resale.  This is why he came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock.  He hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Faasaveve

texts.en: Faasaveve is 42 years old and married with six children. She plans to start a business selling canned fish, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, chicken legs, etc. She has requested a loan to buy a freezer, snacks, soft drinks, flour, sugar, salt and soap. Faasaveve will use her profits to help her family and support her children's education. She has been a member of SPBD since 2008

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, flour, sugar, salts, freezer and soap.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes hoy tiene 26 años de edad, sigue en pareja con el Sr. Alexis, con quien tiene unos mellizos, es una pareja muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que esta luchando por sus hijos, para poder darles todo lo que necesitan y que no les falte nada.
Su anterior préstamo de Kiva lo invirtió en la compra de yerba, galleta, mandioca, bebidas y demás insumos para poder surtir la despensa que tiene. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de harina, aceites, yerba, galleta, mandioca, bebidas y golosinas.
texts.en:
Mercedes is now 26 and she continues with Alexis and their twins.  She is a hard-working entrepreneur who struggles to give her children everything they need so they lack for nothing.

She used her previous Kiva loan to buy herbs, cookies, cassava, beverages and other supplies to stock her store.  She is requesting a new loan to buy flour, oil, herbs, cookies, cassava, beverages and sweets.

loans.use: To buy goods for her store.

loans.name: Rochelle

texts.en:
This is Rochelle. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to buy duck eggs, baskets, and crackers for her Balut business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in meeting the family's personal, household and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan to buy duck eggs, baskets, and crackers. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in more profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and pay the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rochelle hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She attends weekly fellowship meetings* that inspire her to go on with life no matter what the obstacles because she has a big God who will never fail her. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for duck eggs, baskets, and crackers.

loans.name: Rito

texts.en: Rito is married with three children and runs a motorcycle service business to earn a living. He has been doing this for two years, earning income for the family's basic needs. To improve services, he needs to repair his existing vehicle. Rito joined GDMPC and requested a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to cover the cost of motorcycle maintenance. Rito wants to improve the general living situation of his family in the near future.

loans.use: to cover the cost of motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila is 32 years old and married with two children currently in school. Sheila works very hard to provide for her family.

Sheila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like shampoo, sanitary napkins, diapers, eggs and laundry soap to sell.

Sheila has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items in her store. 

Sheila would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like shampoo, sanitary napkins, diapers, eggs and laundry soap to sell

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is 46 years old and is married with four children. The oldest child is 19 years old and is in high school, while the youngest is 8 and is in primary school. 

She has been running this business for over 2 years, which makes her very experienced and her business profitable. Her business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will help her increase her revenue by 30 percent and her standard of living will be improved as well.

loans.use: to buy fruit in large quantities, to re-sell in smaller quantities.

loans.name: Mujeres Vallientes Group

texts.es:
19 mujeres muy trabajadoras forman parte de este grupo muy trabajador y unido, ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza que les permitirá conocer en qué situación se encuentra cada una y conforme a eso poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Luisa, quien en su primera  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir con niveles medios, pero ella es consciente que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza, y pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos de limpieza para la venta.
texts.en:
This hard-working, united group is formed by 19 dedicated women who participate in the poverty elimination program to know their individual situation and work accordingly.

One of the members of the group is Luisa who shows a level two poverty situation on the survey, meaning she is at an intermediate level.  But she is conscious that through effort and continuous work, as well as by applying the characteristics of a successful woman, she will improve her poverty situation.  She sells cleaning products and is requesting a loan to buy products to sell.

loans.use: To buy cleaning products to sell.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
El señor Andres tiene 28 años, es soltero, vive con sus papas y hermanos, comenta que trabajó desde muy joven en la venta de leche.
Su familia tiene una granja y tiene varias vacas lecheras, al comienzo contaba con una moto en la cual hacia sus repartos de leche, empezando con unos pocos clientes, gracias al trabajo arduo y al buen trato con las personas, ha ido aumentando su clientela, en la actualidad ya cuenta con un moto carro en el cual reparte su leche, siendo sus clientes gran parte de la ciudad. 
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar 2 vacas lecheras que le ayudará a poder seguir mejorando su producción de leche.
texts.en:
Andres, 28, is single and lives with his parents and siblings.  He says he has worked selling milk since he was young.  His family has a farm and several dairy cows.  At first, he used a motorcycle to delivery the milk to a few customers but, thanks to his hard work and good service, he has increased his customer base.  Now he has a mini-truck to deliver the milk to customers around much of the city.

He is requesting a loan to buy two dairy cows to help improve milk production.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es:
El Sr. Alcides tiene 28 años y está casado con la Maria que también tiene 28 años, tienen 2 hijos, uno de 2 años y otro de 7 años que ya está en la escuela.
Él tiene una despensa que es atendida por su esposa y por él, además tiene un camión con el que se dedica a la venta y reparto de huevos en plancha, fideos de distintos tipos y golosinas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos como ser bebidas, arroz,  azúcar, fideos, yerba, huevos y golosinas en forma mayorista, de esa manera compraría a menor costo y tendría un mayor margen de ganancia. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de crecer.
texts.en:
Alcides, 28, is married to Maria, 28, and they have two children, one who is two years old and another who is seven and attends school.  Alcides owns a store which he and his wife run.  He also has a truck and sells and delivers eggs, noodles and different types of sweets.

He is requesting a loan to buy goods such as drinks, rice, sugar, noodles, herbs, eggs and sweets on a wholesale basis.  This will allow him to buy at a lower cost to increase his profit margin.  He is grateful for this opportunity to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy goods for his store.

loans.name: Roselia

texts.en:
Roselia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a handicraft business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 18 years, and earns additional income from selling coconuts.

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy more materials for her handicraft business.

Roselia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her handicraft business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a handicraft business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 18 years now.

Victoria requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials like shells, nylon threads, etc. for her handicraft business.

Victoria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials like shells, nylon threads, etc. for her handicraft business.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is 44 years old, and is married with four children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Zosima has a business buying and selling clothes in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock of ready to wear clothes, such as shorts, t-shirts, blouses, etc. to sell to her customers.

Zosima has been in this business for three years. In the future, Zosima would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of ready to wear clothes, such as shorts, t-shirts, blouses, etc. to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Zyril

texts.en:
Zyril works hard to support her family. She is married and has a handicraft business in the Philippines, which she has been in for five years now. 

She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her handicraft business.

Zyril would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her handicraft business.

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
This is Sergia, aged 58, a resident of Taguig, Philippines. She is married to Fredy, and a mother to their children. Sergia, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Sergia operates a house rental business. It is rented on a monthly basis. She also sells frozen and processed foods for additional income. She earns a minimum of 25,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every month. She also has a canteen for additional income.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 20,000 loan. She will use the loan for the repair and maintenance of her apartment. 

Sergia dreams to expand her business and hopes to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her apartment.

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
Cherry started her business when she received a little financial support from her mother. She has been managing a sari-sari (variety) store within her village for five years. She is 28 years old, married and has two children. Her husband is a conductor of bus transportation. 

Cherry believes that education is the best treasure she can give to her children. Her greatest dream in life is to let her children finish their studies and have their own job someday. So, she is doing her best to attain her dream. Cherry is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy grocery items to sell within her village. She hopes that through this loan, she could expand her sari-sari store and sustain her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rosary

texts.en:
Rosary is married with three children. He runs a general store, selling grocery goods in his community to make a living. He has been in this business for more than three years, earning well for the family. 

He borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase more grocery goods to resell. Rosary wants to improve the general living conditions of his family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods to resell.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
This is Josefa. She previously accessed a loan of 14,000 PHP that she used to buy materials she needed for making furniture, such as bamboo, varnish, nails and tools. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, house hold and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 14,000 PHP loan to buy more materials for making furniture. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Josefa hopes to be more successful in her business and dreams to have a good health. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy materials that she needs for making furniture, such as bamboo, varnish, nails and tools.

loans.name: Normalita

texts.en:
Normalita is a widow and has five grown up children. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in her village.She offers various kinds of grocery items such as soap, shampoo, canned goods and condiments. Normalita wants her business to run smoothly and satisfy her customers' demands.

So now, she is seeking a loan of PHP 20,000 which will enable her to buy additional groceries to offer for sale, such as diapers, powdered milk and drinks. She hopes to obtain this loan so she can have a better way of life and save for her future especially when she get weak.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her store, such as diapers, milk and beverages.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 30 years now, and works hard to support her family. 

Alicia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is 56 years old and single. She runs a general store in the Philippines and works very hard. She has been in this business for ten years, and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, candies, toothpaste, laundry soap, shampoo, etc. 

Anastacia has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell, like snack foods, candies, toothpaste, laundry soap, shampoo, etc. 

In the future, Anastacia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell, like snack foods, candies, toothpaste, laundry soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita mentioned that her favorite color is blue, because for her it symbolizes cool. She is 42 years old, married and has four children.

Julita is engaged in selling grocery items within her village. She particularly sells bread and drinks, which is what her customers often come to buy. She wants to borrow PHP 13,000 to strengthen and improve her sales. She will use this loan to buy vegetables, condiments, soaps and canned goods to sell. She believes that by borrowing additional capital she will be able to increase her sales as well as her income. In addition, she will educate her children.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, soaps and canned goods to sell.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is 60 years old and is married with four children. 

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for eight years, and has borrowed four times from NWTF in the past to sustain her business activities. She has now requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Antonia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.en:
Aurora is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling used clothing in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years, and earns additional income from a general store. 

Aurora has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is now borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of used clothing to sell in her used clothing business.

She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nilliam

texts.es:
Nilliam es una persona muy trabajadora, todos los días desde muy tempranas horas empieza a trabajar en su despensa, y de esa forma se gana dignamente la vida. Comenta que su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de bebidas, lácteos, verduras, productos a granel, lo cual le ayudó mucho a poder mejorar sus ventas.
Pide nuevamente de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de más insumos para su despensa, como ser carne, bebidas, verduras y demás, con lo cual podrá seguir con sus ventas. En la foto aparece la Sra. Nilliam y su hijo.
texts.en:
Nilliam is a hardworking person. Every day she starts working in her store very early and thus makes a living with dignity. She says that her earlier loan was invested in the purchase of beverages, dairy products, vegetables, and products in bulk, which helped her very much to improve her sales.

She is asking for a new loan to invest in the purchase of more supplies for her store, for example meat, beverages, vegetables, and more. This will enable her to continue with her sales.

In the picture you see Nilliam with her son.

loans.use: to buy meat, beverages, vegetables, and more.

loans.name: Richard

texts.es:
Richard es una persona por demás trabajadora y luchadora, que tiene como objetivo poder convertirse en un profesional apto que pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su trabajo.
Trabaja y estudia al mismo tiempo, y comenta que es muy sacrificado, ya que termina el día muy agotado, pero que lo hace por superarse.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de clases, como ser fotocopias, libros y demás, que le permitirá seguir con su meta.
texts.en:
Richard is a hardworking and determined person. It is his aim to become a capable professional who can help others through his work.

He works and studies at the same time and says that it is very trying, as at the end of the day he is very exhausted, but he does it to get ahead.

He is asking for a loan to use it for his school expenses, such as photocopies, books, and so on. This will allow him to continue pursuing his goal.

loans.use: to pay for his school expenses, such as photocopies, books, and more.

loans.name: Dinarkhan

texts.ru: Динархан 45 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Динархан - средне-специальное образование, работает в местной больнице медсестрой, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Динархан занимается животноводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Динархан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 30 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Динархан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Динархан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Dinarkhan is 45 years old, married, and, together with her husband, is raising 3 children.  Dinarkhan has a specialized secondary education, and works in the local hospital as a nurse.  Dinarkhan's work in animal husbandry, which began 13 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 10,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Dinarkhan's hard work, she now has 1 milk cow and 30 sheep in her herd.  Her monthly income is 5,000 KGS.  With the goal of expanding her herd, Dinarkhan turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the money from the loan, Dinarkhan plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Chinargul

texts.ru: Чинаргул 42 года, вдова, одна воспитывает 4 детей. У Чинаргул - высшее образование, работает в сельской управе секретарем, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Чинаргул занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Чинаргул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 20 овец, также обрабатывает 1,32 ГА земельной доли на которой ежегодно выращивает фасоль. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чинаргул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Чинаргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома.
texts.en: Chinargul is 42 years old, widowed, and is raising 4 children by herself.  Chinargul has a higher education, and works in the village council as a secretary.  Chinargul's work in animal husbandry, which began 8 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 20,000 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Chinargul's hard work, she now has in her herd 1 milk cow, 20 sheep, and 1.32 hectares of land on which she grows beans.  Her monthly income is 7,000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Chinargul turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the the money from the loan, Chinargul plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd, and also plans to save towards building a new home.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Zulaika

texts.ru: Зулайке 64 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Зулайки - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зулайка занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 500 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Зулайки, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец, а также 3,5 ГА земли на которой выращивает фасоль и многолетние травы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зулайка обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Зулайка планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку мебели.
texts.en: Zulaika is 64 years old, married, and, with her husband, is raising 5 children.  Zulaika has a secondary education.  Zulaika's works in animal husbandry, which began 30 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 500 KGS, serves as the major source of income for her family.  Thanks to Zulaika's hard work, she now has in her herd 2 milk cows, 20 sheep, and 3.5 hectares of land on which she grows beans and perennial herbs.  Her monthly income is 7000 KGS.  With the goal of increasing her herd, Zulaika turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to purchase cows for breeding.  With the income from the loan, Zulaika plans to invest in the further expansion of her herd, and also plans to save towards purchasing furniture.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина молодая и умная девушка. Ей 24 года. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Парвина с детства любила заниматься спортом. Уже более 5 лет как она занимается тэквандо и каратэ. Парвина успешная спортсменка. В свободное время она шьет платья. Она берет на заказ платья для невесток. Парвина скоро будет участвовать  в соревновании по каратэ в Российской Федерации, но она не имеет денег для покупки авиабилета, а также ей необходимы деньги для гостиницы. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки авиабилета, и оплатить за гостиницу. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Parvina is an intelligent young woman.  She is 24 years old and she is married and lies with her parents.  Since childhood, she has loved doing sports.  For five years, Parvina has been practicing tae kwon do and karate and she is a successful sportswoman.  In her spare time, she works as a seamstress taking commissions for wedding dresses.  Parvina will soon take part in a karate meet in the Russian Federation, but she does not have enough money to buy the plane ticket, nor does she have enough for the hotel.  She is asking fora  loan of 5,000 somoni to buy her plane ticket and hotel.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy an air ticket and to pay for a hotel in Russia

loans.name: Amruddin

texts.ru: Амруддин честный и жизнерадостный молодой человек. Он родился в 1995 году. Амруддин учится в Таджикском Государственном Металлургическом Университете. Он студент 1 курса. Амруддин живет с родителями. В свободное время от занятий он помогает своим родителям по домохозяйству. Он очень начитанный молодой человек. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Amruddin is an honest and cheerful young man.  He was born in 1995 and he is a first-year student at the Tajik State Metallurgical University.  Amruddin lives with his parents and he helps out around the house in his spare time.  He is a well-read young man.  He is asking for a loan to pay for his tuition.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his education

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврон трудолюбивый человек. Она родился в 1988 году. Даврон женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей, поэтому Даврон единственный кормилец семьи. Даврон раньше занимался предоставлением услуги маляра, но его доход от этой услуги была маленькая и не хватала на жизнь. Даврон решил организовать новый бизнес. Он хочет организовать бизнес перевозки пассажиров. С такой целью он обратился в ИМОН за займом в сумму 8500 сомони для покупки маршрутки. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Davron is a hard-working man.  He was born in 1988 and he is married with two children.  His wife stays at home and looks after the children, so Davron is the only breadwinner in the family.  He used to work as a painter, but his income from this work was small and it wasn't enough to live on.  Davron has decided to start his own business as a minibus driver.  With that goal in mind, he has turned to IMON for a loan of 8,500 somoni to buy a minibus.  He is awaiting your kindness and counting on your charity.

loans.use: to buy a minibus to start new his business

loans.name: Alcides De Jesús

texts.es:
Alcides es un hombre de 46 años al que se le dificultó encontrar oportunidades laborales, decidió emprender su propio negocio con la venta de productos por catálogo, con el ánimo de generar recursos por cuenta propio para su sustento, el oficio lo aprendió gracias a su hermana que realiza la misma actividad; lleva trabajando dos meses durante la mayor parte del día, sus principales clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos del sector.
Su propósito con el crédito es comprar mercancía al por mayor (malteadas, suplementos nutricionales, multivitamínicos, productos de aseo personal y para el hogar, cosméticos, entre otros) así podrá abastecer su inventario para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, logrando una fidelización y un aumento en las ventas y en los ingresos que percibe por su labor.
Alcides manifiesta que su proyecto a mediano plazo es convertirse en un empresario con su negocio bien establecido y posicionado en el mercado, que le permita tener mejores ingresos para mejorar las condiciones de vida y su bienestar.
texts.en:
Alcides is a 46-year-old man who found it difficult to find employment opportunities. Therefore he decided to start his own business selling products through catalogues with the aim of generating his own income to sustain himself. He learned this activity from his sister who doing the same work. He has been working for two months for most of the day and his main customers are neighbors, family members and friends in the area.

He plans to use the loan to buy merchandise in bulk (shakes, nutritional supplements, multivitamins, personal care and household products, cosmetics, etc.) in order to stock up on goods to satisfy the demand of his customers. By this he wants to achieve customer loyalty and an increase in sales and in the income he gets for his work.

Alcides says that his medium-term project is to become a businessman with a well-established business which is firmly positioned in the market. This will allow him to have more income in order to improve his living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in bulk (shakes, nutritional supplements, multivitamins, pesonal care products, household products, cosmetics, etc.)

loans.name: Nasimkhon

texts.ru: Насимхон занимается сельским хозяйством. Ему 52 года. Он живет в районе Яван. Насимхон женат. У него двое дочерей и пятеро сыновей, которым с 8 по 24 года. Вся его семья помогает ему в сельском хозяйстве. Насимхон занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Одновременно он разводит крупнорогатый скот. Насимхон занимается данными деятельностьями в течение 7 лет. Сейчас он всецело поглощен озимым посевом. С этой целью он берет кредит для купли семян, минеральных удобрений и топливо. Насимхону нравится его деятельность. Ведь он обеспечивает свежими и экологически чистыми овощами не только семью, но и жителей сёл.
texts.en: Nasimkhon is a farmer.  He is 52 years old and he lives in the Yavan region.  He is married with two daughters and five sons who range in age from 8 to 24.  His whole family helps him on the farm.  Nasimkhon is involved in agriculture and he also raises cattle - he has been doing this kind of work for seven years.  Now he is fully absorbed in the winter sowing.  With this goal in mind, he is asking for a loan to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer and fuel.  Nasimkhon enjoys his work.  After all, he provides fresh and organic vegetables not only for his family, but for the residents of his village.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Bukush

texts.ru: Букуш 66 лет, вдова, одна воспитала 4 детей. У Букуш среднее образование, имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине. Букуш в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2007 года занимается торговлей кондитерскими изделиями, опыт работы в этой отрасли есть, помогает ей в этом бизнесе дочь-Анара. Букуш начала этот бизнес с 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Букуш, она смогла развить и расширить свой товар, ее деятельность приносит около 10,000 сом KGS в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Доходы от бизнеса позволили Букуш расширить свой товарооборот. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Букуш обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - покупку оптовых продуктов для изготовления кондитерских изделий для дальнейшей перепродажи, в арендованном магазине. Доходы от кредита Букуш планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Bukush is 66 years old and she is a widow raising four children.  She has a high school education and her her neighbors hold her in very high esteem - they say that she is a kind and hard-working woman.  As the main source of income for her family, Bukush makes and sells baked goods with the help of her daughter, Anara.  She has been doing this since 2007 and she is experienced in the industry and the work itself.  She started this business with 20,000 som KGS.  Thanks to her hard work, Bukush has been able to expand her trade and the work she does now brings in about 10,000 som KGS per month, which serves as the main income for her family's food and daily needs.  The income she has made from her business has allowed Bukush to expand her offerings.  With the goal of developing her business further, she has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to buy wholesale baking products for further work and to rent a shop.  She plans to reinvest this money back into her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bakery

loans.name: Saida

texts.ru: Саида является мастером своего дела.  Она опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей 23 года. Она не замужем и не имеет детей. С целью того, чтобы помочь своим родителям по обеспечению семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 3 года назад она начала свой бизнес шитьем и продажей женской одежды. Она шьет платья дома и продает на местном рынке. На рынке она имеет своих клиентов. Саида хочет пополнить оборотный капитал и с такой целью она обратилась в ИМОН за займом.  Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки тканей. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saida is a master at work.  She is an experienced seamstress and she makes Tajik national dresses that can be counted as masterpieces.  She is 23 years old, she is not married and has no children.  With the goal of helping her parents take care of the family and provide for their needs, she started her business sewing and selling women's clothing three years ago.  She sews dresses at home and sells them at the local market, where she has her own clients.  Saida wants to increase her working capital and with that goal in mind, she has turned to IMON for a loan.  She is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy fabric.  She is counting on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy fabric to increase her working capital

loans.name: Asmao's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Soulabaly a été créé le 17 Mai 2011 lors de l’inauguration leur banc villageois. A ce jour le groupe compte en son sein des femmes qui ont su maintenir et développer leurs activités de petits commerce et agricoles. Elles habitent toutes le même village, et partagent des valeurs de solidarité et d’entre aide. 

Madame Asmao (debout à extrême droite avec la main gauche levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette elle est divorcée, mère de trois enfants dont deux filles et un garçon. C’est une des leaders du groupement et joue pleinement son rôle dans le banc villageois. Elle a des activités multiples de la vente de légume à la vente de produits alimentaires de consommation courante et de petit déjeuner au village. 

Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter un bidon d’huile de 20 litre à 16 000 F CFA, de l’ognon un sac de 25 Kg à 9 500 Frs CFA, du piment pour 3 000 Frs CFA le Kg, un carton de thé vert à 15 000 Frs CFA et un seau de gombo à 2 500 Frs CFA, pour la revente au détail dans son village.

  Les bénéfices lui permettront d’assurer la prise en charge de ses enfants, ainsi de satisfaire ses propres besoins.
texts.en:
The Soulabaly group was created May 17, 2011 during the inauguration of their "banc villageois" loan association. To date the group includes women who have managed to maintain and grow their small trade and agricultural businesses. They all live in the same village, and share values ​​of solidarity and mutual aid.

Madame Asmao (standing on the far right with her left hand raised), is the featured borrower. She is divorced, mother of three children: two girls and a boy.

She is one of the leaders of the group and plays a full role in the "banc villageois". She has many activities from selling vegetables and basic grocery products to preparing breakfasts in the village.

This new loan will enable her to buy a 20-liter can of oil for 16,000 CFA francs, one 25-kilo bag of onions for 9,500 CFA francs, peppers at 3,000 CFA francs a kilo, a box of green tea for 15,000 CFA francs and a bucket of okra for 2,500 CFA francs, for retail sale in her village.

Profits will enable her to provide support for her children and meet her own needs.

loans.use: buy a 20-liter can of oil at 16,000 CFA francs, one 25-kilo bag of onions at 9,500 CFA francs, peppers for 3,000 CFA francs a kilo, a box of green tea for 15,000 CFA francs and a bucket of okra for 2,500 CFA francs, for retail sale in her village.

loans.name: Hadjia's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc villageois a été mis en place le 22 Juillet 2009 à l'occasion de son inauguration. Ce groupement est composé de femmes d’une détermination sans faille, elles vivent dans le même quartier et partagent des liens forts de solidarité, c’est dans cette lancé qu’elles viennent d’entamer leur dixième cycle. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et la transformation de produits agricoles. 

Madame Hadja (assise à droite), est l’emprunteuse vedette, c’est une femme très engagée dans le fonctionnement du blanc villageois. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants une fille et un garçon. Elle s’active dans la transformation des produits locaux plus particulièrement de l’arachide en patte d’arachide. Cette activité, elle la pratique depuis plus d’une dizaine d’années et jouit d’une bonne dans ce domaine.

Avec ce prêt, elle compte acheter une trentaine de sacs d’arachide pour les besoins de la transformation.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte accroître son épargne et soutenir son mari dans la en charge des dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" loan association was established July 22, 2009 at its inauguration. This group is composed of women with unwavering determination. They live in the same neighborhood and share strong bonds of solidarity.

Following this spirit they are now entering their tenth loan cycle. Their main activities are small trade and the processing of agricultural products.

Madam Haja (seated to the right), is the featured borrower. She is a woman deeply involved in the functioning of the "banc villageois". She is married and mother of two children: a girl and a boy.

She is active in processing local products, especially peanut paste. She has been practicing this activity for over ten years and has a good reputation in this area.

With this loan she will buy thirty bags of peanuts for the purpose of processing.

With the profits she intends to increase her savings and support her husband in dealing with family expenses.

loans.use: buy thirty bags of peanuts for processing.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, comenta que sus metas futuras son poder ejercer la carrera que estudia, y que está emprendiendo y así poder ayudar a su familia.
Está estudiando la carrera de ciencias contables, y dice que le gustaría también poder especializarse y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo como profesional.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
María lives in the city of Carapeguá. She says that her future goals are to practice the career she is studying, and that she wants to get ahead to be able to help her family.

She is studying an accounting career and says that she would also like to specialize in this area in order to continue growing as a professional.

She is asking for this loan in order to pay her university fees and by this to be able to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Daniel De Jesús

texts.es:
Daniel, a sus 50 años de edad, ha luchado incansablemente para salir adelante en compañía de su esposa y sus dos hijos; ha trabajado en diferentes empresas, realizando diversas actividades pero, durante los últimos 5 años se ha desempeñado como trabajador independiente, prestando el servicio de transporte de materiales y acarreos en su propio vehículo, el oficio lo aprendió por medio de una amigo y poco a poco fue adquiriendo experiencia y conocimiento de la labor; trabaja solo de 7 am a 7 pm y, así ha logrado generar ingresos para solventar los gastos de su familia.
Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de comprar un par de llantas y pintar el vehículo, esto le permitirá prestar sus servicios de una manera segura tanto para él como para sus clientes, además le dará una mejor presentación a su carro, lo que podrá atraer la atención de nuevos y potenciales clientes, logrando un incremento en sus ingresos.
Daniel manifiesta que su único interés es luchar por el bienestar de su familia, por lo que seguirá trabajando sin descanso para poder brindarles una estabilidad económica favorable que le permita dar una mejor educación a sus hijos y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de los que ama.
texts.en:
Daniel, at 50 years old, has struggled tirelessly to get ahead with his wife and two children. He has worked in different companies, involved in various activities but for the past five years he has been an independent worker, rendering transport of materials and haulage services in his own vehicle. He learned the trade from a friend and bit by bit, gained experience and knowledge of the industry. He works from 7am to 7pm, and has been able to make the income to pay his family expenses.

Currently, he is asking for a loan with the aim of buying a pair of rims and to paint his vehicle. This will allow him to offer his services in a reliable manner just as much for himself, as for his customers. Furthermore, it will improve the appearance of his vehicle, which could attract attention from new and potential customers, achieving an increase in his income.

Daniel says that his only interest is to struggle for the wellbeing of his family, for which he will keep working tirelessly to be able to offer them a favorable economic stability, which will allow him to give a better education to his children and to enjoy a better quality of life with his loved ones.

loans.use: to buy a pair of rims and paint his vehicle.

loans.name: Albeiro De Jesus

texts.es:
Albeiro nació en el seno de una familia campesina muy humilde, que se dedicaban a realizar las labores del campo para conseguir el sustento familiar, fue allí donde aprendió a trabajar la agricultura, lo que hoy en día le da la posibilidad de tener sus propios cultivos de fríjol, maíz y papa criolla, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en el mercado del municipio donde reside con su esposa y sus 5 hijos; esto le permite generar los recursos para solventar las necesidades básicas de los miembros de su familia.
El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fungicidas, fertilizantes, entre otros); esto le permitirá darle continuidad a su labor y podrá tener una cosecha mucho más productiva, para hacerle frente a los desafíos que se le presentan por los altos costos de los insumos y por la inestabilidad en los precios de venta de los productos agrícolas.
Albeiro tiene como proyecto, ampliar sus cultivos y mejorar su rentabilidad para estar en la capacidad de brindar bienestar y una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Albeiro was born into a humble peasant family, who were worked in farming to be able to sustain the family. From his family he learned how to work in agriculture and this gives him the opportunity to have his own crops of bean, corn and “papa criolla” (a common type of potato in Colombia) today. He harvests the crops and sells them in the market of the town where he lives with his wife and their 5 children. This allows him to earn the money required to cover the family’s basic needs.

He will invest the loan in the purchase of supplies bought in bulk (manure, pesticides, fungicides, fertilizers, etc.). This will allow him to continue his work and to have a much better harvest. Thus he will be able to cope with the challenges he faces, which are the high cost of supplies and the instability of the selling prices of agricultural products.

Albeiro’s plan is to expand his cultivations and to improve their profitability in order to be able to offer his family well-being and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies in bulk (manure, pesticides, fungicides, fertilizers, etc.).

loans.name: Kadiatou's Group

texts.fr:
Créer le 10 Décembre 2012, le banc villageois est composé de femmes très désireuses de faire prospérer leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe, Elles habitent toutes le même quartier et s’activent principalement dans le petit commerce et la transformation de produits locaux.

Madame Kadidiatou  (assise à  droite avec la main gauche levée), l’emprunteuse vedette. Elle mariée et mère de sept enfants dont trois garçons et quatre filles. Elle est vendeuse de « Thiakri » c’est un aliment à base de mil et de lait cailler et de la bouillie de mil le soir plat très prisé par les autochtones. Pour se faire elle achète le mil par sac de 50 kg, fait la transformation en couscous pour le « Thiakri » et de la farine de mil pour la bouillie, par contre pour le lait elle achète du lait en poudre et fait sa propre fermentation.

Avec ce nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter au moins cinq sacs de mil à 7 500 Frs CFA le sac, deux sacs de sucre à 25 000 Frs CFA l’un, un sac de25 Kg de lait en poudre à…. Et des ingrédients.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’aider son mari dans la gestion de la maison d’une part et d’autre part à satisfaire ses besoins sans appui extérieur.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was established on December 10, 2012. It is made up of women who are very eager to prosper their money-earning businesses.

There is a good connexion between the members of the group. All women live in the same neighborhood, and their main business is retail and the transformation of local products.

Mrs. Kadidiatou (on the right in the sitting row, raising her left hand) is the featured borrower. She's married and the mother of seven children, three boys and four girls.

She sells "Thiakri", a food product made out of millet and curdled milk, as well as millet porridge in the evening, a dish very much appreciated by the locals.

She buys millet in 50-kg sacks, transform it into couscous to make Thiakri, and into millet flour for the porridge. Regarding the milk, she buys it in powdered form and make it ferment herself.

With this new loan, she intends to buy at least five sacks of millet, costing XOF 7'500 each, two sacks of sugar, costing XOF 25'000 each, one 25-kg sack of powdered milk, and other ingredients.

One part of her profits will enable her to help her husband running the household, the remainder will enable her to provide for herself without external help.

loans.use: to buy millet, sugar, powdered milk, and other ingredients

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is a 59-year-old widow who has two grown children. She plants and harvests rice and corn crops to sell. Aside from farming, she also engages herself in a retail grocery business. Leonila sells a variety of grocery items such as breads, candies and beverages. 

Leonila states that she receives a monthly allowance but she doesn’t want to rely on it solely. She wanted to earn enough money to be able to help her grandchildren. Hence, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy canned goods, spices, vinegar and other items for her store. Leonila hopes to maintain her business while she manages it.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, spices, vinegar and other items needed for her retail store.

loans.name: Bodo's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc villageois a été mis en place le 22 Juillet 2009 à l'occasion de son inauguration. Ce groupement est composé de femmes d’une détermination sans faille, elles vivent dans le même quartier et partagent des liens forts de solidarité, c’est dans cette lancé qu’elles viennent d’entamer leur dixième cycle. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce et la transformation de produits agricoles. 

Madame Bodo (assise à la troisième position de la droite vers la gauche), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est âgée de 57 ans, mariée  et mère de 03 enfants dont 02 filles et 01  garçon. Son activité s’articule dans l’achat et le stockage d’arachide pour la revente pendant la saison sèche. Aussi elle fait du jardinage. Raison pour la quelle ce prêt sera exclusivement utiliser à l’achat de graine d’arachide pour stockage et revente.

Son nouveau prêt, elle prévoit d’acheter au moins 15 sacs d’arachide à 10 000 le sac pour stockage au moins pendant 04 mois  et de la semence pour le jardinage.

 Les bénéfices seront utilisés pour appuyer son mari  dans la scolarité des enfants d’une part et d’autre part elle compte renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" loan association was established July 22, 2009 at its inauguration. This group is composed of women with unwavering determination. They live in the same neighborhood and share strong bonds of solidarity.

Following this spirit they are now entering their tenth loan cycle. Their main activities are small trade and the processing of agricultural products.

Mrs. Bodo (sitting in the third position from right to left), is the featured borrower. She is 57 years old, married and the mother of three children: two girls and a boy. She is active in the buying and storage of peanuts, for resale during the dry season. She also practices gardening.

Therefore this loan will be devoted only to buy peanuts for starage and resale. She intends to use her new loan to buy at least 15 bags of peanuts at 10,000 (XOF) a bag for at least four months' storage and also seeds for gardening.

The profits will serve to assist her husband with the children's tuition and also to strengthen her savings.

loans.use: buy at least 15 bags of peanuts at 10,000 (XOF) a bag for at least four months' storage and seeds for gardening.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy the products needed for her direct selling business. Her loan is also helpful in the education of her children. Her income from her business, on the other hand, is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
Nida would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies and merchandise such as clothing, footwear, undergarments and cosmetics needed in her business. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Nida dreams of having a happy family and hopes that her business will last longer. She meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise such as clothing, footwear, undergarments and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Due to financial burden, Rosemarie runs a small variety store to help her husband in generating income. She is 31 years old and has two kids. She and her husband aim to become financially stable and give their children a better future. With regards to her situation, she plans to improve the business and make it profitable. For her to attain her goal, she is asking for a loan of 8,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) to buy additional stocks of snack foods, canned goods, noodles, eggs, beverages, seasonings, and soft drinks to sell. Through this loan, she believes that she will further improve her variety store business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of snack foods, canned goods, noodles, eggs, beverages, seasonings, and soft drinks to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Celsa works hard to support her family.

She has a fish-vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from a general store. Celsa is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers for her fish-vending business.

Celsa has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en:
Concordia is 59 years old and married with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. In the picture, we can see a customer waiting for his order and a son of Concordia who helps her with the business.

Concordia has a business selling food in the Philippines. Concordia requested a 25,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan amount through NWTF (Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.) to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Concordia has been in this business for 11 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Aneka

texts.en:
Aneka lives in Bogor, a city located at a one-hour drive from Jakarta, the capital city. Aneka is single and lives with three persons in the family home. As their needs are growing day by day, Aneka wants to expand her small stall to be able to support the family's needs. Her small stall sells snacks, drinks, household needs, mobile phone airtime credits, and servesbill payments. 

Aneka's first loan from Kiva allowed her to process more transactions on mobile phone airtime credits and bill payment service, especially on weekends when sales are at their peak. As her business continues to grow, Aneka is taking another Kiva loan that she needs as working capital to process more transactions. In the photo, Aneka is standing in front of her small stall. Aneka thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
This is Francisca, 64, resident of Taguig, Philippines. She is married to Custodio, a pensioner, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Francisca operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php18,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Francisca hopes to have her store bigger and dreams of becoming rich.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
To have an additional source of income, Evelyn engages herself in the hog-raising business. She is 59 years of age and blessed with two children.  She and her husband work together in order to earn a  living and educate the children.

Evelyn plans to acquire more piglets to raise but she has inadequate capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000.00 to buy necessary hog feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. She is hoping that her loan will be granted to further improve her business and way of living.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is 28 years old. He is from the village of Centro 1, San Guillermo. To generate income, Edwin is engaged in agricultural business, particularly planting and harvesting rice to sell. He has been in this kind of business for four years and earned a net income of about 25,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) with his last crop. 

With his determination to have continuous growth of his rice crop production, he is asking for a new loan amounting to 25,000 PHP. He will use this loan for buying fertilizers, seedlings, and insecticides to improve the growth of his crops. Edwin will be grateful if his requested loan is granted.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seedlings, and insecticides for the proper growth of his agricultural business.

loans.name: Fatou Sene's Group

texts.fr:
Créer le 10 Décembre 2012, le banc villageois est composé de femmes très désireuses de faire prospérer leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Il existe une bonne connexion entre les membres du groupe, Elles habitent toutes le même quartier et s’activent principalement dans le petit commerce et la transformation de produits locaux.
Madame Fatou (assise à  droite avec la main gauche levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette. C’est une jeune femme très déterminée dans le développement de ses activités commerciales, âgée de 29 ans, elle est mariée et mère d’une fille. Elle fait le commerce, plus particulièrement la vente de tissus et d’accessoires vestimentaires. Elle achète sa marchandise dans un grand marché de la capitale et la revend par crédit moyennant une avance représentant le tiers du prix total.

Pour son nouveau prêt, elle va acheter spécialement des tissus  wax, brodé et des ensembles pour homme pour les revendre lors des fêtes de fin d’année.
